V05bhivin_u:2_0: 1. oṃ namo buddhāya / āryamahāsāṃghikānāṃ lokottaravādināṃ madhy'-udeśikānāṃ pāṭhena bhikṣuṇīvinaya
V05bhivin_u:3_0: bhagavān samyaksambuddho yadarthaṃ samudāgato tadartham abhisambhāvayitvā śākyeṣu viharati śākyānāṃ kapilavastusmin nyagrodhārāme śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyānāñ ca buddho bhagavān satkṛtogurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito arcito apacāyito lābhāgrayaśo-'graprāpto lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārānān /
V05bhivin_u:3_1: tatra cānupalipto padmam iva jalena puṇyabhāgīyān satvān puṇyehi niveśayamāno phalabhāgīyān satvān phalehi pratiṣṭhāpayamāno vāsanābhāgīyān satvān vāsanāyām avasthāpayamāno amṛtam analpakena devamanuṣyān samvibhajanto prāṇikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇy amṛtaṃ anuprāpayanto anavarāgrajātijarāmaraṇasaṃsārakāntāranarakavidurgān mahāprapātād abhyuddharitvā kṣeme śive same sthale abhaye nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayamāno āvarjayitvā aṅgamagadhavṛjimallikāśikośalakurupañcālacedivatsamatsyaśūrasenaśividaśārṇa cāsvakiavanti /
V05bhivin_u:4_0: jñāne dṛṣṭaparākramo svayāṃbhūḥ divyehi vihārehi viharanto brāhmehi vihārehi āryehi vihārehi aniñjehi vihārehi viharanto brāhmehi vihārehi āryehi vihārehi aniñjehi vihārehi sātatye hi vihārehi buddho buddhavihārehi jino jinavihārehi jānako jānakavihārehi sarvajño sarvajñavihārehi cetovasiparamapāramipraptāś ca punar buddhā bhagavanto yehi yehi vihārehi ākāṅkṣanti tehi tehi vihārehi viharanti vihārakuśalāś ca punar buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5_0: 2. atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī cchandāya cchandakapālāya dāsacchandāye cchandakamātare ca pañcahi ca śākiyānīśatehi sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi ekāntasthitā mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:5_2: bhagavāṃs caitarhi loke utpanno tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho dharmo ca deśayati aupasamiko pārinivāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāya samvartati /
V05bhivin_u:5_3: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadaṃ bhikṣuṇibhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5_4: bhagavān āha / mā te gautami rocatu tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:6_1: na khalu bhagavān mātṛgrāmasya avakāśaṃ karoti tathāgata pravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvāyeti /
V05bhivin_u:6_2: sā bhagavato pādau śirasā vanditvā sārdhaṃ cchandāya cchandakapālāye dāsacchandāye cchandakamātare ca yena tāni pañca śākiyānīśatāni tenopasaṃkramitvā śākiyānīyo etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:6_3: na khalu āryamiśrikāyo bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāupasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvāya /
V05bhivin_u:6_4: kim puna vayam āryamiśrikāyo sāmam eva keśān otārayitvā kāṣāyāni vastrāṇi ācchādayitvā kośakābaddhehi yānehi bhagavantaṃ kośalehi janapadehi cārikāṃ caramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭhimena pṛṣṭhim ābandhema /
V05bhivin_u:6_5: sace mo bhagavān anujāniṣyati pravrajiṣyāmo no ca anujāniṣyati evam tu tāyi bhagavato santike brahmacaryañ cariṣyāmaḥ sādhu āryeti tāyo śākiyānīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye pratyāśrauṣi /
V05bhivin_u:7_0: 3. atha khalu bhagavān kapilavastusmin nagare yathābhiramyaṃ viharitvā kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmi /
V05bhivin_u:7_1: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī sārdhaṃ cchandāye cchandakapalāye dāsacchandāya cchandakamātare ca pañcahi ca śākiyānīśatehi sātmaneva keśān otārayitvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādayitvā kośakabaddhehi yānehi bhagavantaṃ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭhimena pṛṣṭham anubandheṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8_0: 4. atha khalu bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caramāno mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcahi bhikṣuśatehi yena kośalānāṃ śrāvastīnagaraṃ tad avasāri /
V05bhivin_u:8_1: tad anuprāptas tatraiva viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
V05bhivin_u:9_0: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
V05bhivin_u:9_1: ekāntasthitā mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:9_3: bhagavāṃś caitarhi loke utpanno tathāgato rhaṃ samyaksambuddho dharmo ca deśate aupasamiko ca pārinirvāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāya samvartati /
V05bhivin_u:9_4: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:9_5: evam ukte bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:9_6: mā te gautamī rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāupasampadābhikṣuṇibhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:10_1: na khalu bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāya upasampadāya bhikṣuṇibhāvasyeti /
V05bhivin_u:10_2: sā bhagavato pādāṃ śirasā vanditvā jetavanasya ārāmadvārakoṣṭhakasamīpe rodamānī asthāsi pādāṇguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhantī /
V05bhivin_u:10_3: addaśāśi khu anyataro bhikṣur mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ jetavanasya ārāmadvārakoṣṭhasamīpe rudamānīn tiṣṭhantīṃ pādāṅguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhentīṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān ānando tenopasaṃkramitvā āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:10_4: eṣā āyuṣman ānanda mahāprajāpatī gautamī jetavanasya ārāmakoṣṭhakasamīpe rudamānī tiṣṭhati pādāṅguṣṭhena bhūmiṃ vilikhantī /
V05bhivin_u:10_5: gacchāvusānanda jānehi kiṃ mahāprapatī gautamī rodīti /
V05bhivin_u:11_0: 6. atha khalu āyuṣmān ānando yena mahāprajāpatī gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:11_1: kiṃ gautami rudasi / evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:11_2: alam me āryānanda ruṇṇena yatra hi nāma evaṃ durlabho buddhotpādo evaṃ durlabhā saddharmadeśanā /
V05bhivin_u:11_3: bhagavāṃś caitarhi loke utpanno tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho dharmo deśīyati aupasamiko pārinirvāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāyai samvartati /
V05bhivin_u:11_4: na ca bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasampadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvasya ścai sādhu tāvāryānanda bhagavantaṃ yāca yathā labheya mātṛgrāmo pi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:12_0: 7. sādhu gautamīti āyuṣmān ānando mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye pratiśrutvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādauśirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
V05bhivin_u:12_1: ekāntasthito āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat durlabho bhagavan buddhotpādo durlabhā saddharmadeśanā bhagavān cetarhi loke utpanno tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho dharmo ca deśyate aupasamiko pārinirvāṇiko sugatapravedito amṛtasya prāptaye nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāyai samvartati /
V05bhivin_u:12_2: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upadampadāṃ bhikṣuṇibhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:12_3: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:12_4: mā te gautamīmātā rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:13_0: 8. atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando / bhagavān nāvakaśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgata pravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāupasaṃpadāye bhikṣuṇībhāvasyeti /
V05bhivin_u:13_1: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena mahāprajāpati gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:13_2: na khalu gautamī bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvāya /
V05bhivin_u:13_3: evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:13_4: sādhu tāvāryānanda dvitīyaṃ pi bhagavantaṃ yāca yathā mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:13_5: sādhu gautamīti āyuṣmān ānando dvitīyaṃ pi mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye pratiśrutvā yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
V05bhivin_u:13_6: ekānte sthito āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:13_7: durlabho bhagavan buddhotpādo ti tad evaṃ sarvaṃ yāva bhikṣuṇībhāvo ti evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:13_8: māte gautamī mātā rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyā upasaṃpadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:13_9: saṃyathāpi nāmānanda sampanne yavakaraṇe ca kāraṇḍavaṃ nāma rogarājā ti upanipateya evan taṃ sampannaṃ yavakaraṇaṃ mahatā upakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ bhavati evam eva gautamī mātā yasmin prāvacane mātṛgrāmo pi labhati pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ evan taṃ prāvacanaṃ mahatāmupakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:13_10: sayyathāpi nāma gautamī mātā sampanne ikṣukaraṇe mañjiṣṭhā nāma rogarājā ti evan taṃ sampannaṃ ikṣukaraṇam mahatā upakleśena upakliṣṭam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:13_11: evam eva gautamī mātā yasmin prāvacane mātṛgrāmo pi labhati pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ evan taṃ prāvacanam mahatā upakleśena upakliṣṭam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:13_12: sayyathāpi nāma mā te gautamī mātā rocatu mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadā bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:14_0: 9. atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando / bhagavān nā vakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvasyeti /
V05bhivin_u:14_1: yena mahāprajāpatī gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:14_2: na khalu gautamī bhagavān avakāśaṃ karoti mātṛgrāmasya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyāyopasaṃpadāya bhikṣuṇībhāvasyeti /
V05bhivin_u:14_3: evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:14_4: sādhu tāvāryānanda tṛtīyaṃ pi bhagavantaṃ yāca yathā mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:14_5: sādhu gautamītī āyuṣmān ānando tṛtīyaṃ pi mahāprajāpatīya gautamīya pratiśrutvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣīdi ekāntaniṣaṇṇo āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:14_6: purimakānāṃ bhagavan tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ kati parṣāyo abhuvan /
V05bhivin_u:14_7: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:14_8: purimakānām ānanda tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ catvāri pariṣāyo abhuvan sayyathīdaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:15_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:15_1: ye ime bhagavan catvāro śrāmaṇyaphalā sayyathīdaṃ śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam agraphalam arhatvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:15_2: bhavyo eteṣāṃ mātṛgrāmo pi eko 'pramatto ātāpi vyupakṛṣṭo viharanto sākṣīkartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:15_3: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:15_4: yānīmāni ānanda catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalāni sayyathīdaṃ śrotaāpattiphalaṃ yāvad agraphalam arhatvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:15_5: bhavyo eteṣāṃ matṛgrāmo pi eko 'pramatto ātāpi vyupakṛṣṭo viharanto sākṣīkartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:16_0: 10. evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:16_1: yato khalu bhagavan purimakānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ catvāro parṣāyo abhūṃsuḥ bhikṣubhikṣuṇī upāsakopāsikā /
V05bhivin_u:16_4: bhavyo eteṣāṃ mātṛgrāmo pi eko apramatto ātāpi vyupakṛṣṭo viharanto sākṣīkartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:16_5: sādhu bhagavan mātṛgrāmo pi labheya tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:16_6: duṣkarakārikā ca bhagavato mahāprajāpatī gautamī āpāyikā poṣikā janetrīye kālagatāye stanyasya dāyikā bhagavāṃś ca kṛtajño kṛtavedī /
V05bhivin_u:16_7: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:16_8: evam etad ānanda duṣkarakārikā ānanda tathāgatasya mahāprajāpatī gautamī āpāyikā poṣikā janetriye kālagatāye stanyasya dāyikā tathāgato ca kṛtajño kṛtavedī ca /
V05bhivin_u:16_9: api cānanda tathāgato pi mahāprajāpatīya gautamīya duṣkarakārako /
V05bhivin_u:16_10: tathāgataṃ hy ānandāāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī buddhaśaraṇaṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:16_11: dharmaśaraṇaṃ gatā / saṃghaśaraṇaṃ gatā tathāgataṃ hy ānandāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī
V05bhivin_u:18_0: tathāgataṃ hy ānandāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī śraddhayā vardhati /
V05bhivin_u:18_1: śīlena vardhati śrutena vardhati tyāgena vardhati /
V05bhivin_u:18_2: prajñayā vardhati / tathāgataṃ hy ānandāgamya mahāprajāpatī gautamī duḥkhaṃ jānāti samudayaṃ jānāti /
V05bhivin_u:19_0: 11. yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:19_1: dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati / saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati / iminā ānanda pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikaraṇaṃ bhavati yāvajjīvaṃ pi na upasthiheya yad uta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārehi /
V05bhivin_u:19_3: yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātāto prativiramati /
V05bhivin_u:19_8: iminā pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikaraṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:19_12: yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya śraddhayā vardhati śīlena śrutena tyāgena prajñayā vardhati /
V05bhivin_u:19_13: iminānanda pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikaraṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:19_14: yāvajjīvaṃ pi na upasthiheya yad uta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārehi /
V05bhivin_u:19_15: evaṃ pi se na supratikāram bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:19_16: yaṃ ānanda pudgalo pudgalam āgamya duḥkhaṃ jānāti samudayaṃ jānāti nirodhañ jānāti mārgañ ca jānāti /
V05bhivin_u:19_17: iminā ānanda pudgalena imasya pudgalasya na supratikāram bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:19_18: yāvajjīvaṃ pi na upasthiheya yad uta cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārehi /
V05bhivin_u:19_19: evaṃ pi se na supratikaram bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:20_1: sace khalu aham ānandasya gautamasya putrasya yāvattṛtīyakaṃ api prativahiṣyāmi bhaviṣyati ca se cittasyānyathātvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:20_2: śrutā pi se dharmā sammohaṃ gamiṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:20_3: kāmaṃ varṣasahasraṃ pi me saddharmo sthāsyati /
V05bhivin_u:20_4: mā haivānandasya gautamīputrasya bhavatu cittasyānyathātvaṃ mā pi se śrutā dharmā sammoṣaṅ gacchantu /
V05bhivin_u:20_5: kāmaṃ pañcāpi me varṣaśatāni saddharmo sthāsyati /
V05bhivin_u:20_6: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayati sma /
V05bhivin_u:20_7: sayyathāpi nāmānanda iha puruṣo parvatasaṃkṣepe setuṃ bandheya yāvad eva vārisya anatikramaṇāya evam evānanda tathāgato bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭa gurudharmān prajñāpeti ye bhikṣunīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā anatikramaṇīyā velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:23_0: 13. varṣaśato pasampannāye ānanda bhikṣuṇīye tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya śirasā pādā vanditavyā /
V05bhivin_u:23_1: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prathamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣūṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāva anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:24_1: aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇī deśitāśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye ubhayato saṃghe upasampadā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:24_2: ayam ānanda dvitīyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo yāva velā iva samudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:25_1: āvaḍḍo ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhikṣuṣu vacanapatho bhūtena vā abhūtena vā anāvaḍḍo bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīṣu vacanapatho bhūtena no abhūtena /
V05bhivin_u:25_2: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ tṛtīyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:26_1: bhaktāgraṃ śayyāsanaṃ vihāro ca bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣuto sādayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:26_2: ayam ānanda caturtho gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo vistareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:27_1: gurudharmāpannāye ānanda bhikṣuṇīye ardhamāsam bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe mānatvaṃ yācitavyaṃ ubhayato saṃghe ca āhvayanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:27_2: ayam ānanda paṇcamo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:28_2: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnām ṣaṣṭho gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:29_1: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi abhikṣuke āvāse varṣām upagantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:29_2: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saptamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo vistareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:30_1: varṣoṣitāhi ānanda bhikṣuṇīhi ubhayatosaṃghe pravāraṇā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:30_2: ayam ānanda bhikṣuṇīnāṃ aṣṭamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyo pūjayitavyo anatikramaṇīyo velā iva samudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:31_0: ime ānanda bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭau gurudharmā ye bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā anatikramaṇīyā velā iva samudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:32_0: 14. sace nāmānanda mahāprajāpatī gautamī imān aṣṭa gurudharmān pratīcchati catuhi ca patanīyehi dharmehi anadhyācārāya śikṣāṃ śikṣati /
V05bhivin_u:32_3: sādhu bhagavann iti āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena mahāprajāpatī gautamī tenopasaṃkramitvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:32_5: sayyathāpi nāma gautamī iha puruṣa parvatasaṃkṣepe setuṃ bandheya yāvad eva vāriṣya anatikramaṇāya evam eva gautamī bhagavān bhikṣuṇīnāṃ aṣṭagurudharmān prajñāpeti ye bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā anatikramaṇīyā velāmiva samudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:33_0: 15. katame 'ṣṭa / varṣaśatopasampannāya gautamī bhikṣuṇīya tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya pādā śirasā vanditavyā /
V05bhivin_u:33_1: ayaṃ gautamī bhikṣuṇīnām prathamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yo anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva samudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:33_4: yāva sace khu tvaṃ gautamī imān aṣṭa gurudharmān pratīcchasi catuhi ca patanīyehi dharmehi anadhyācārāya śikṣāṃ śikṣasi /
V05bhivin_u:33_5: eṣā eva te adyadagreṇa pravrajyā eṣā upasampadā eṣa bhikṣuṇībhāvo /
V05bhivin_u:34_0: 16. evam ukte mahāprajāpatī gautamī āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:34_1: sayyathāpi nāmānanda iha syāt yuvā puruṣo maṇḍanajātīyo śīrṣasnāto āhatavastranivastro utpalamālām vā campakamālām vā kumudamālām vā tṛṇamolikamālām vā śirasā pratīccheya evam evāham āryānanda imān aṣṭagurudharmān śirasā pratīcchāmi catuhi ca patanīyehi dharmehi anadhyacārāya śikṣāṃ śikṣāṃ śikṣiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:35_0: 17. atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī sārdhaṃ cchandāyi cchandakapālāye dāsacchandāye cchandakamātare ca pañcahi ca śākiyāniśatehi sārdhaṃ yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:36_1: tasmād iha bhave bhikṣuṇīyo adydagreṇa mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ saṃghasthavirāṃ saṃghamahattarīṃ saṃghathaviriṇā vikandhāvetha /
V05bhivin_u:36_2: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇāmayitvā bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:36_3: ye ime bhagavan bhikṣuṇīnāṃ aṣṭagurudharmā bhagavatā saṃkṣiptena bhāṣitā vistareṇa vibhaktā labhyā te 'smābhir vistareṇa śrotuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:37_0: 19. bhagavān āha / labhyā / āha / kinti dānī gautamī varṣaśatopasampannāye bhikṣuṇīye tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalīkarma samīcīkarma kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:37_2: yadāhaṃ varsaśatopasampannā bhaviṣyaṃ bhikṣu ca tad ahopasampanno bhaviṣyati tadāham abhivādanavandanapratyutthānamañjalīkarma sāmīcikarma kariṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:38_0: 20. atha khalu sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi sthavirīhi vā navāhi vā madhyamāhi vā sarveṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām stherāṇāṃ navānāṃ madhyamānāṃ abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalīkarma sāmīcikarma kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:38_1: / ete dāni bhikṣū bhikṣūṇīupāśrayaṃ praviṣṭā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:38_2: sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi stherīhi vā navāhi vā madhyamāhi vā sarveṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ stherāṇāṃ navānāñ ca madhyamānām abhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalīkarma sāmīcīkarma kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:39_0: 21. atha dāni bhikṣuṇī jarādurbalā vā bhavati vyādhidurbalā vā yattakānāṃ abhisaṃbhuṇoti tattakānāṃ pādā śirasā vanditavyā /
V05bhivin_u:39_3: etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuvihāraṃ nirdhāvanti sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi stherīhi vā navāhi vā madhyamāhi vā sarveṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ therāṇāṃ navānāṃ madhyamānāṃ pādā śirasā vanditavyā /
V05bhivin_u:39_4: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī jarādurbalā bhavati vyādhidurbalā vā yattakānām abhisaṃbhuṇoti tattakānāṃ pādā śirasā vanditavyā śiṣṭakānāṃ mūrdhni añjalīṃ kṛtvā vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:40_0: 22. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya paribhavanena koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā ḍhossabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā akhallamahalle ti vā akuśalo ti vā apratikṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā na śirasā pādān vandati gurudharmam atikrāmati /
V05bhivin_u:40_1: evaṃ gautamī varṣaśatopasampannāye bhikṣuṇīye tadahopasampannasya bhikṣusya śirasā vanditavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:40_2: ayaṃ gautamī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prathamo gurudharmo yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyo pūjayitavyo anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva samudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:41_1: 23. kinti dāni gautamī aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dvevarṣāṇi śikṣitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye ubhayatosaṃghe upasampadā pratyāsaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:41_2: yā dāni eṣā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā bhavati tāye bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe dvevarṣāṇī śikṣādeśanāsaṃmuti yācitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:41_4: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho / iyam itthannāmā nāma aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:41_5: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyamnāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā saṃghaṃ dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yāceyā /
V05bhivin_u:41_6: yāciṣyati āryamiśrikāyo saṃgho iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ /
V05bhivin_u:41_7: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:42_0: 24. tāya dāni yācitavyaṃ / vandāmi āryasaṃghaṃ / aham itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣāmi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:42_1: sāhaṃ saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yācāmi /
V05bhivin_u:42_2: sādhu vata me āryasaṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ detu /
V05bhivin_u:43_1: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:43_2: tasyā āryasaṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutin dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:44_0: śṛṇotu me āryā saṃgho / iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadāṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:44_1: seyaṃ saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:44_2: tasyā saṃgho itthan nāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutin deti /
V05bhivin_u:44_3: yasyā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇī śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena sā tūṣṇīm asya /
V05bhivin_u:44_5: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ pi tṛtīyaṃ pi dinnāmāryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsaṃmutiḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:44_6: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:45_0: 26. tasyā dāni kā vattā / sarvabhikṣuṇīnān navikā sarvaśrāmaṇerīṇāṃ vṛddhā āsanaparyanto tāye sādayitavyo [1] /
V05bhivin_u:45_1: bhaktaparyanto tāye sādayitavyo [2] yvāguparyanto tāye sādayitavyo [3] yat tasyā 'miṣam akalpikam taṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āmiṣaṃ kalpikaṃ [4] yaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āmiṣaṃ kalpikaṃ tasyā taṃ āmiṣaṃ akalpikaṃ [5] bhikṣuṇīyihi tasyāḥ tena parivartaśeyyā kartavyā [6] tāya pi śrāmaṇerīṇāṃ tena parivartakaśeyyā kartavyā [7] /
V05bhivin_u:45_2: bhikṣuṇīyihi sā pratigrāhaṇikā kārāpayitavyā sthāpayitvā agnikalpañ ca [8] /
V05bhivin_u:45_3: jātarūparajatañ ca [9] tāye pi śrāmaṇerīyo pratigrāhaṇikā kārāpayitavyāyo [10] /
V05bhivin_u:46_0: 27. na kṣamati tāye poṣadho vā pravāraṇā vā abhisaṃbhuṇituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:46_1: atha khalu yadā poṣadho vā pravāraṇā vā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:46_2: tadaho tāyi vṛddhāntam āruhya mūrdhni añjaliṃ kṛtvā vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:46_4: dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi / vandāmi āryāyo viśuddhāṃ dhārayetha trīṇi vārāṃ jalpīya gantavyaṃ [11] na kṣamati sā prātimokṣasūtraṃ śrāvayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:46_5: atha khalu yattakaṃ pāriyati padaphalakāye grāhayituṃ tattakaṃ grāhayitavyā [12] /
V05bhivin_u:47_0: na kṣamati abrahmacaryaṃ pratisevituṃ [13] na kṣamati adinnam ādayitum [14] /
V05bhivin_u:48_0: na kṣamati svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād vyoparāyituṃ [15] na kṣamati abhūvanam uttarimanuṣyadharmam prajānituṃ [16] /
V05bhivin_u:49_0: evaṃ yattakaṃ pārīyati padaphalake grāhayituṃ tattakaṃ grāhayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:50_1: gandhāmālāvilepanadhāraṇaṃ / surāmaireyamadyapānāñ ca / yattakāni divasāni adhyācarati tattakāni divasāni uktāni śikṣā śikṣitavyā [18] /
V05bhivin_u:51_0: 28. yaṃ kālaṃ dve varṣāṇi bhavanti tato tāya saṃgho upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ yācitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:52_1: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāmkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasampadām bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:52_2: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve vaṣrāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:52_4: yāciṣyati āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmā aṣṭādaśāvarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā dve varsāṇi upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ /
V05bhivin_u:52_5: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇim etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:53_0: 29. tāya dāni yācitavyaṃ / vandāmi āryasaṃgham aham itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarśā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:53_2: sādhu me āryā saṃgho upasthāpanāsaṃmutin detu /
V05bhivin_u:53_3: dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi / vandāmi āryāyo aham itthan nāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:53_7: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho / iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūriśikṣā sā saṃghaṃ upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:53_8: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthan nāmāye aṣṭādeśavarṣāye kumārī bhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthhāpanāsaṃmutin dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:54_0: 30. śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyaṃ itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārī bhūtā dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā paripūrṇaśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:54_2: tāya saṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ deti /
V05bhivin_u:54_3: yāsāṃ āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśa varṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:54_4: sā tūṣṇīm asya / yasya na kṣamati sā bhāṣitu /
V05bhivin_u:54_5: iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā / evaṃ dvitiyā tṛtīyā karmavācaneti /
V05bhivin_u:55_0: 31. dinnā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśa varṣāye kumāribhūtāye dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāye upasthāpanāsaṃmuti saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:55_1: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:56_1: vandāmy ārye aham itthannāmā āryām upādhyāyinīṃ yācāmi /
V05bhivin_u:56_3: evaṃ dvitiyam pi tṛtīyam pi yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:56_5: anuśrāvaṇācāryā paryeṣitavyā dve rahānuśāsanācāryā paryeṣitavyā yo gaṇo samudānayitavyo gaṇasya upanāmayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:57_0: 33. karma / śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho iyam itthannāmā itthannāmāya upasampādyā /

V05bhivin_u:144_0: aśokaṃ virajaṃ kṣemaṃ dvīpaṃ lenaṃ parāyaṇaṃ
V05bhivin_u:144_1: taṃ prāpuṇatha nirvāṇaṃ eṣā vo sarvasaṃpadā // [3]
V05bhivin_u:145_0: evaṃ gautami aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārī bhūtāye ubhayataḥsaṃghe upasaṃpadā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:145_1: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ dvitīyo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:146_1: 83. kin ti dāni gautami āvaḍo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhikṣūhi vacanapatho bhūtena vā abhūtena vā anāvaḍo bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīhi vacanapatho bhūtena abhūtena /
V05bhivin_u:146_2: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣuṃ dharṣiya vaktuṃ koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā vaidyabhikṣū ti vā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā akhallā mahallaapratijñaakuśalo ti vā vaktuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:147_0: 84. atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye kaścit pravrajito bhavati jñātiko vā bhrātā vā /
V05bhivin_u:147_2: na kṣamati adhyupekṣituṃ nāmapi kṣamati dharṣiya vaktuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:147_3: atha khalu prajñayā samjñāpayitavyo yadi tāvat taruṇako bhoti vaktavyo /
V05bhivin_u:147_4: sālohita idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:147_5: kin dāni yadā jīrṇo vṛddho mahallako adhvagatavayan anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:147_6: etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yac ca uddiśeśi svādhyāyesi bhadrako guṇavān śikṣākāmo bhavesi buddhānām śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:148_0: 85. atha dāni so vṛddho bhoti / vaktavyo / idanīṃ imīdṛśo punas tvaṃ taruaṇakāle idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:148_1: kin dāni yadā maṇḍaladvāram anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi tadā śikṣiṣyasi yā py eṣā tava parṣā sāpi tava dṛṣṭā anukṛtim āpadyamānā anayavyasanam āpadyiṣyatīti etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yat tvam uddiśasi svādhyāyesi bhadrako guṇavān /
V05bhivin_u:148_2: śikṣākāmo bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā vaidyabhikṣū ti vā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā akhallamahallaaprakṛtijñaakuśalo ti vā dharṣiya jalpati gurudharmam atikramati /
V05bhivin_u:149_0: 86. anāvaḍo bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīhi vacanapatho bhūtena vā abhūtena iti na kṣamati bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇīṃ dharṣiya vaktuṃ muṇḍastrī chinnakavaḍeti jalpati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:150_0: 87. atha dāni bhikṣor mātā vā bhaginī vā pravrajitikā bhavati sā ca uddhatā vā unnaḍā vā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:150_1: na kṣamati adhyupekṣituṃ yadi tāvat taruṇikā bhoti /
V05bhivin_u:150_2: vaktavyā / sālohite idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣiṣyasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:150_3: kiṃ dāni yaṃ kālaṃ jīrṇavṛddhā mahallikā bhaviṣyasi etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yat tvaṃ uddiśesi svādhyāyesi bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhanāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:151_0: 88. atha dāni sā vṛddhā bhoti / vaktavyā / sālohite idānīṃ tvam īdṛśī kīdṛśī punas taruṇīkāle idānīṃ tvan na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi kin dāni yaṃ kālaṃ maṇḍaladvāram anuprāptā bhavisyasi tadā śikṣiṣyasi yā py eṣā tava parṣā sāpi tava dṛṣṭā anukṛtim āpadyamānā anayena vyasanam āpadyiṣyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:151_1: etat tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yat tvaṃ uddiśesi svādhyāyasi bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesīti /
V05bhivin_u:152_0: eṣa gautami āvaṭo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhikṣūhi vacanapatho bhūtena vā / abhūtena vā /

V05bhivin_u:155_1: 89. kin ti dāni gautami bhaktāgraṃ śayanāsanāgraṃ vihārāgrañ ca bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto sā dayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:156_0: eṣo dāni koci bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya bhaktaṃ karoti vaktavyo /
V05bhivin_u:156_1: jyeṣṭhaparyāyatā karohīti / atha dāni so āha nāsti mama taṃhi śraddhā nāsti prasādo ti vaktavyaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:156_2: vayaṃ pi na praticchāmo ti / atha dān āha / dattapūrvaṃ teṣāṃ mama mātrā vā pitrā vā goṣṭhīsambandhena vā śreṇīsaṃbandhena vā samayasambhandhena vā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ na kadācin mayā bhaktaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:156_3: pratigṛhṇantu āryamiśrikā ti antamasato ekapiṇḍapātaṃ pi dāpayitvā bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho śatarasaṃ pi bhojanaṃ praticchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:157_0: 90. kin ti dāni śayanāsanāgraṃ / eṣo dāni kocid bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya śayanāsanaṃ dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:157_1: vaktavyaṃ / jyeṣṭhaparyāyatāvad dehīti / atha dāni so āha nāsti mama tahiṃ śraddhā nāsti prasādo /
V05bhivin_u:158_0: vayaṃ pi na praticchāmo ti / atha dān āha / dattapūrvaṃ mama ārye bhikṣusaṃghasya śayanāsanaṃ mātrā vā yāvat samayasambandhena vā /
V05bhivin_u:158_1: pratīcchantvāryamiśrikā ti antamasato khayu[?]kā mañcaṃ pi bhikṣusaṃghasya dāpayitvā mahārhaṃ śayanāsanaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaḥ pratīcchaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:159_0: 91. kin ti dāni vihārāgraṃ / eṣo dāni kocit bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:160_0: atha dān āha / ārye nāsti mama tahiṃ śraddhā /
V05bhivin_u:160_1: nāsti prasādo ti / vaktavyaṃ vayaṃ pi na pratīcchāmo ti /
V05bhivin_u:160_2: atha dān āha / ārye kārāpitan teṣāṃ vihārāḥ mātrā vā yāvat samayasambandhena vā pratīcchantv āryamiśrikā vihāran ti antamasato gomayagṛhaṃ pi piṣṭhagṛhaṃ pi bhikṣusaṃghasya dāpayitvā bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho saptabhūmakaṃ pi vihāraṃ pratīcchaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:161_0: 92. tā etā bhikṣuṇīyo avajñāya paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā /
V05bhivin_u:161_1: vaidyabhikṣū ti vā / akhallamahallāprakṛtijño tī vā kṛtvā bhaktāgraṃ śayanāsanāgraṃ vihārāgraṃ bhikṣusaṃghāto na śātiyati gurudharmam atikrāmati /
V05bhivin_u:161_2: evaṃ gautamī bhaktāgraṃ śayanāsanagraṃ vihārāgraṃ bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto sātayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:162_0: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ caturtho gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:163_1: 93. kin ti dāni gurudharmāpannāya bhikṣuṇīya ardhamāsaṃ mānatvañ caritavyaṃ ubhayataḥ saṃghe āhvayanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:164_0: sā dāni eṣā bhikṣuṇī gurudharmān apannā bhavati tāya ardhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ ubhayataḥ saṃghe ca āhvayanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:164_1: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā yāvad akuśalo ti vā kṛtvā gurudharmāpannā samānā nārdhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghe mānatvaṃ carati ubhayataḥ saṃghe ca āhvayanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:164_2: gurudharmam atikramati / ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pañcamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:165_1: 94. kin ti dāni anvārdhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ yadaho dāni poṣadho bhavati tadaho bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena bhikṣuvihāraṃ gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:165_2: atha dāni sarvasaṃgho na gacchati ardhasaṃghena gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:165_3: ardhasaṃgho na gacchati aṣṭāhi vṛddhatarikāhi gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:165_4: aṣṭa vṛddhatarikā na gacchanti antamasato māsacārikiṇīhi pakṣacārikiṇīhi vā cchandārhaṇāṃ chandaṃ gṛhṇīya gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:165_5: yadi tāvad anukālyaṃ bhavati stūpo tāvad vanditavyo /
V05bhivin_u:165_6: stūpaṃ vanditvā yo tahiṃ bhikṣur abhilakṣito bhavati parijñāto vā tasya chando dātavyo /
V05bhivin_u:165_8: āryasamagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pādān śirasā vandati /
V05bhivin_u:165_10: poṣadhañ ca pratīcchati / dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:166_0: 95. atha dān āha / ahaṃ saṃghasthaviro ahaṃ tatradeśako ahaṃ bhikṣuṇīovādako ti tābhir api ete trayo varjaṃ kṛtvā śiṣṭakānāṃ chando dātavyo chandaṃ datvā bhikṣuṇīupāśrayaṃ gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:166_1: yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho upaviṣṭo bhavati poṣasdhakarmāya sūtroddeśikāya sūtraṃ pragṛhītaṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:166_2: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā pāñcadaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ ettakaṃ ṛtusya nirgataṃ ettakam avaśiṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:167_0: kiṃ saṃghasya pūrvakṛtyaṃ / alpārtho 'lpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvikāsaṃgho śobhati anāgatānām āryamiśrikāṇāṃ chandapariśuddhiṃ ārocetha /
V05bhivin_u:167_1: nīto chandahārikāhi chando ti tāhi vṛddhāntam āruhitvā sāmīciṃ kṛtvā vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:167_2: nīto 'smābhiḥ chandahārikābhiś chando itthan nāmenāryeṇa pratīcchito /
V05bhivin_u:168_0: 96. yaṃ kālaṃ bhikṣusaṃgho upaviṣṭo bhavati sūtroddeśakena sūtraṃ pratigṛhītaṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:168_1: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā pāñcadaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:168_3: kiṃ saṃghasya pūrvakṛtvā alpārtho alpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho śobhati /
V05bhivin_u:168_5: ārocitañ ca prativedetha / ko bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīnāṃ chandahārako tenotthāya vṛddhāntaṃ āruhya vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:168_6: vandāmy āryasaṃghaṃ samagro hi bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya pādāṃ śirasā vandati /
V05bhivin_u:168_7: avavādañ ca yācati / poṣadhañ ca praticchati / evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:168_8: yadi tahiṃ bhikṣuṇītovādako sammatako bhavati vaktavyo /
V05bhivin_u:169_0: 97. atha dāni na kocid bhikṣuṇīyovādako bhavati tatra yo dvādaśehi aṅgehi samanvāgato bhavati so sammanyitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:169_1: katamehi dvādaśehi / tadyathā / prātimokṣasamvarasamvṛto viharati ācāragocarasampannaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:169_2: anumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī samādāya śikṣitaśikṣāpadeṣu kāyakarmavākkarmaṇā sammanvāgataḥ /
V05bhivin_u:169_4: bahuśrutaś ca abhidharme bahusrutaś ca bhavaty abhivinaye partibalo ca bhavaty adhiśīlaśikṣāyām vinayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:170_1: tṛ / pratibalo bhavaty adhiprajñāṃ śikṣāyāṃ vinayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:170_4: hrā / na ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ gurudharmaṃ āpadyitā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:170_5: to kalyāṇavacanaś ca bhavati kalyāṇavākkaraṇopetaś ca bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:170_6: pauryavācā samanvāgato vispaṣṭāya anelāya arthasya vijñāpanīya /
V05bhivin_u:171_0: imehi dvādaśehi aṅgehi samanvāgato bhikṣuṇīovādaka sammutīya saṃmanyitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:172_1: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho ayam itthannāmo ti bhikṣur aṅgopeto /
V05bhivin_u:172_2: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhikṣuṇītovādakaṃ saṃmutīya saṃmanyeya ovayikā eṣā jñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:172_3: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho ayam itthannāmo bhikṣur taṃ saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhikṣuṇīovādakaṃ saṃmutīya sammanyati /
V05bhivin_u:172_4: yeṣām āyuṣmantānāṃ kṣamati itthannāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ bhikṣuṇīovādakaṃ saṃmutīya sammanyiyamānaṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:172_5: so tūṣṇīm asya / yasya na kṣamati so bhāṣatu /
V05bhivin_u:172_6: iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā evaṃ dvitīya tṛtīyā karmavācaneti /
V05bhivin_u:172_7: sammato bhante saṃgho itthannāmo bhikṣuḥ bhikṣuṇīovādaka saṃmutīya saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:172_8: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:173_0: 99. tena dāni sammatena samānena tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo ovāditavyāyo nākāle [1] /
V05bhivin_u:173_1: nādeśe [2] / nānāgate kāle [3] / nātikrānte kāle [4] / na chandaśo [5] / na vyagraśo [6] / na pārṣado [7] / na dīrghovādena [8] / āgantukāmasya preṣitavyā [9] /
V05bhivin_u:174_0: kin ti dāni nākālo / akālo nāma astamito sūryo / antarhito ca aruṇo [1] /
V05bhivin_u:175_0: kin ti dāni nādeśe / adeśo nāma veśikāsāmante vā dyūtakaraśālāsāmante vā /
V05bhivin_u:175_1: pānāgāraśālāsāmante vā / vadhabandhanāgāraśālāsāmante vā atibhūṇḍe vā atiprākaṭe vā pradeśe [2] /
V05bhivin_u:176_0: kin ti dāni nānāgate kāle anāgato nāma kālo pratipade dvitīyāyām vā [3] /
V05bhivin_u:177_0: kin ti dāni nātikrānte kāle / atikrānto nāma kālo caturdaśīyām vā pañcadaśīyām vā /
V05bhivin_u:177_1: atha khu tṛtīyāprabhṛti tāvad ovaditavyā yāvat trayodaśīti [4] /
V05bhivin_u:178_0: kin ti dāni na chandaśo / ovādakasya bhikṣuṇīya chando dātavyo / atha khu sarvāhi āgantavyaṃ [5] /
V05bhivin_u:179_0: kin ti dāni na vyagraśo / na bhikṣuṇā vyagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho ovaditavyo /
V05bhivin_u:180_0: kin ti dāni na pārṣado / na tāvat tava parṣā ovaditavyā tavādya parṣāye ovādakavāro tavādya parṣāye ovādakavāro ti /
V05bhivin_u:181_0: kin ti dāni na dīrghovādena ovaditāḥ / atha khu saṃkṣiptena ovaditavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:183_0: eṣa bhaginīyo ovādo śiṣṭakaṃ parikathā bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:184_1: yadi so bhikṣuṇīovādako deśāntaraṅ gato bhavati tato ye tasya sārdhevihārikāvā antevāsikā bhavanti te bhikṣunīsaṃghena utsāhayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:184_3: teṣān dāni gacchantānām āgacchantānāñ ca pathy adanenāvaikalyaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:184_4: āgacchantasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena chatradhvajapatākehi yojanaṃ panthasya pratyudgantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:184_5: yaṃhi vihāre avatarāya taṃhi ubhayasaṃghasya saptāhaṃ bhaktaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:184_6: atha dāni daridro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho bhavati bhikṣusaṃghasyaiva saptāhaṃ bhaktaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:184_7: antamasato ekapiṇḍapātenāpi pratimānayitavyo tena dāni bhikṣuṇīovādakena bhikṣuṇīhi dhītāsaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:184_8: tāhi bhikṣuṇīhi tasmin bhikṣuṇīovādakehi pitṛsaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:185_0: 101. na kṣamati tena bhikṣuṇīovādakena ghoṭena yathā prasārya grīvāṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo ovādituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:185_1: atha khalu yugamātraṃ nirīkṣante na tāyo ovāditavyāyo /
V05bhivin_u:185_2: yadi kadācit tahiṃ bhavet keśāvartena vā kṛtena /
V05bhivin_u:185_3: akṣīhi vā añcitena ākoṭitamaṣṭehi vā cīvarehi /
V05bhivin_u:185_4: śvetena vā kāya bandhanena / citrakuṭāhi vā upānahāhi / na kṣamati adhyupekṣituṃ / yadi tāva taruṇikā bhavati dharṣayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:185_5: he avyakte akuśale idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi yaṃ kālaṃ jīrṇavṛddhā mahallikā adhvagatavayam anuprāptā bhaviṣyasi yā pi tavaiṣā parṣā sā pi tava dṛṣṭvā anukṛtim āpadyamānā anayena vyasanam āpadyiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:185_6: etaṃ tava sādhu etat pratirūpaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:185_7: atha dāni sā vṛddhā bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:185_8: sālohite idānīṃ īdṛśī kīdṛśī tvam āsi taruṇe kāle idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:185_9: yaṃ kālaṃ maṇḍaladvāram anuprāptā bhaviṣyasi yāpi tava eṣa parṣā sāpi tava dṛṣṭvā nukṛtim āpadyamānā anayā vyasanam āpatsyati etat tava sādhu etaṃ pratirūpaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ bhadrikā guṇavatī śikṣākāmā bhavesi buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:186_0: 102. atha dāni so bhikṣuṇīyovādako gocaraprasṛto rathyāyaṃ bhikṣuṇīn paśyati keśāvartena vā kṛtena /
V05bhivin_u:186_1: akṣīhi vā añcitehi / ākoṭitamaṣṭehi vā cīvarehi / śvetena vā kāyabandhanena / citrakūṭāhi vā upānahāhi na dāni kṣamati nahi kīñcij jalpituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:186_2: mā jano ojjhāpeya paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇako bhāryām iva śravaṇikām ovadati /
V05bhivin_u:186_3: atha khu pṛcchitavyā / katamahiṃ eṣā vihārake prativasati /
V05bhivin_u:186_4: kā se upādhyāyī / kā se ācāryā paścād uktaṃ tahiṃ gatvā ovaditayvā /
V05bhivin_u:186_5: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:186_6: vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:186_7: akhallamahallaakuśalaaprakṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā anvārdhamāsaṃ bhikṣusaṃghāto ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na pratyāśaṃsati gurudharmam atikramati /
V05bhivin_u:186_8: evaṃ gautami anvardhamāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi bhikṣusaṃghāto ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:187_0: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ṣaṣṭo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:188_1: 103. kin ti dāni na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi abhikṣuke avāse varṣām upagantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:189_0: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi abhikṣukehi grāmanagarehi varṣām upagantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:190_0: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī jñātikehi grāmavāsakehi nimantrīyati /
V05bhivin_u:190_1: ihāryā varṣāvasāna ti na ca tahiṃ keci bhikṣū bhavanti bhikṣuṇī ca jñātikāmanukaṃpitukāmā bhavanti vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:190_3: atha dān āhaṃsuḥ / nāsti asmākaṃ tahiṃ śraddhā /
V05bhivin_u:190_4: nāsti prasādo / vaktavyam / ahaṃ pi na icchāmi / atha dāni bhikṣuṇī savibhavā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:190_7: teṣām āgatānāṃ samānānāṃ āhāreṇa avaikalyaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:190_9: tāya bhikṣuṇīya tahiṃ varṣām tāya bhikṣuṇīya teṣām bhikṣūṇāṃ mūle anvardhamāsaṃ ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:191_0: 104. atha teṣām bhikṣūṇāṃ varṣām upagatānāṃ antaravarṣā-r-astu /
V05bhivin_u:191_2: na dāni kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya kahiñci gantuṃ yāvat pravāraṇākālaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:191_3: yadi tāvat kṣemam bhavati tato te śabdāpayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:191_4: na dāni āgantikāyo / atha khalu uktena nimantrayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:192_0: āgatānāṃ samānānāṃ bhaktena pratimānīya ācchādīya yathā samvibhāgan dātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:192_1: pravārite kiñcāpi yaṃhi chando tahiṃ gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:193_0: 105. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭa bhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:193_1: vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā kṛtvā cūḍabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā khallamahallaakuśalaaprakṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā abhikṣuke āvāse varṣām upagacchati gurudharmam atikramati /
V05bhivin_u:193_2: evaṃ gautami na kṣamati bhikṣunīya abhikṣuke āvāse varṣām upagantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:193_3: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saptamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvaj jīvaṃ satkartavyo yāvad anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:194_1: 106. kin ti dāni varṣoṣitāhi bhikṣuṇīhi ubhayato saṃghe pravāraṇā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:194_2: yadaho dāni saṃghasya pravāraṇā bhavati tadaho bhikṣuṇīhi pravārayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:194_3: aparejjukāto pratipade kalyato ye ca nirdhāviya bhikṣuvihāraṃ gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:194_4: yadi tāva samagro bhikṣusaṃgho bhavati na kṣamati sarvāhi bhikṣuṇīhi apūrvācarimaṃ prāvarayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:195_1: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho / iyam itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī pratibalā pravārāyikā /
V05bhivin_u:195_2: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīm saṃghasya pravārāyikāṃ saṃmanyeya /
V05bhivin_u:196_0: śṛṇotu me āryasaṃgho / iyam itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī pratibalā pravārāyikā /
V05bhivin_u:196_1: tāṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ saṃghasya pravārāyikāṃ saṃmanyati /
V05bhivin_u:196_2: yāsām āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ saṃghasya pravārāyikāṃ saṃmanyiyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:196_3: sā tūṣṇīm asya / yasyā na kṣamati sā bhāṣatu /
V05bhivin_u:196_4: iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā / evaṃ dvitīyā tṛtīyā karmavācaneti /
V05bhivin_u:196_5: vaktavyaṃ / sammatā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmā saṃghasya pravārāyikā saṃghena kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:197_2: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagraṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pravāreti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
V05bhivin_u:197_3: ovadantu mo āryo saṃgho arthakāmo hitaiṣī anukampako anukampām upādāya jānantyo paśyantyo smarantyo yathā dharmavinayaṃ pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:198_0: atha dāni samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho bhavati saṃbahulā bhikṣū bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:198_1: vaktavyaṃ / samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho saṃbahulān bhikṣūn pravāreti dṛṣṭena śrutena yāvat pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:199_0: 109. atha dāni samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho bhavati eka bhikṣu ca bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:199_1: vaktavyaṃ / samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho āryaṃ pravāretīti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvat pratikariṣyāmaḥ evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi /
V05bhivin_u:200_2: vaktyavyaṃ saṃbahulāḥ āryamiśrikāḥ samagraṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pravārenti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvat pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:201_0: atha dāni saṃbahulā ca bhikṣuṇīyo bhavanti saṃbahulā ca bhikṣu bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:201_1: vaktavyaṃ / saṃbahulā āryamiśrikāḥ saṃbahulān āryamiśrān pravārenti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvad /
V05bhivin_u:201_2: yathā dharmaṃ yathā vinayaṃ tathā pratikariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:202_1: eka bhikṣu ca bhavati / vaktavyaṃ / saṃbahulā āryamiśrikāḥ āryaṃ pravārenti dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā yāvad yathā dharmaṃ yathā vinayaṃ tathā pratikariṣyāmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:203_1: samagro ca saṃgho bhavati / vaktavyaṃ / aham itthannāmā saṃghaṃ pravāremi dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
V05bhivin_u:203_2: ovadatu mo āryo saṃgho yāvat pratikariṣyāmi evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi /
V05bhivin_u:204_2: vaktavyaṃ / aham ithannāmā saṃbahulān āryamiśrān pravāremi dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
V05bhivin_u:204_3: ovadantu me āryamiśrā yāvad yathādharmaṃ pratikariṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:205_1: eka bhikṣu bhavati / vaktavyaṃ / aham itthannāmā āryaṃ pravāremi dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā /
V05bhivin_u:205_2: ovadatu me āryo artha kāmo hitaiṣī anukampako anukampām upādāya jānantī paśyanti smarantī yathā dharmaṃ yathā vinayaṃ tathā pratikariṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:206_0: 110. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avajñāya vā paribhavena vā koṇṭabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:206_1: vaidyabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā / cūḍabhikṣū ti vā kṛtvā akhallamahallaakuśalaaprakṛtijño ti vā kṛtvā /
V05bhivin_u:206_2: varṣoṣitā ubhayato saṃghapravāraṇān na pratyāśaṃsayati gurudharmam atikrāmati /
V05bhivin_u:206_3: evaṃ gautami varṣoṣitāhi bhikṣuṇīhi ubhayato saṃghe pravāraṇā pratyāśaṃsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:206_4: ayaṃ gautami bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭamo gurudharmo yo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyo pūjayitavyo anatikramaṇīyo velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:207_0: ime gautami bhikṣuṇīnām aṣṭau gurudharmāḥ ye bhikṣuṇīhi yāvajjīvaṃ satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitvyā anatikramaṇīyā velāmiva mahāsamudreṇa /
V05bhivin_u:210_0: 111. atha khalu bhagavān bhikṣuṇīyo āmantrayate sma tasmāt tahiṃ bhikṣuṇīyo adyadagreṇa mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīṃ saṃghasthavirīṃ saṃghamahattarīṃ saṃghapariṇāyikāṃ dhārayatha /
V05bhivin_u:211_0: ya ime bhagavan bhagavatā catvāro patanīyo dharmo abhijñāya deśitāḥ labhyā te bhagavann asmābhi vistareṇa śrotuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:212_0: 112. pañcārthavaśān saṃpaśyamānāya śraddhāya kuladhītāya alam vinayam uddiśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:213_0: 113. ekam idaṃ gautami samayan tathāgato śrāvastīyam viharati /
V05bhivin_u:213_1: atha khalu śāriputrasya sthavirasya yāvat ko nu khalu bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena ihaikeṣān tathāgatānām,
V05bhivin_u:213_2: arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānām atyayena cirasthitikaṃ prāvacanaṃ bhavati cirasthitikaḥ saddharma iti yathā bhikṣuvinaye /
V05bhivin_u:214_0: ekam idaṃ gautami samayan tathāgato vaiśālīyam viharati /
V05bhivin_u:214_2: tasmāt tarhi gautami bhikṣuṇyāpi atraiva śikṣitavyam /
V05bhivin_u:216_0: vistareṇa tasmād iha gautami bhikṣuṇīhi atraiva śikṣitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:217_0: 114. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:217_2: atha khalu bhagavān sannipatitaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ viditvā yāvac chikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:218_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī chandaso maithunaṃ grāmyaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣeviya antamasato tiryagyonigatena pi sārdhaṃ iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:219_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ti upasampannā sūpasampannā traivācikena karmaṇā jñapticaturthena anāghātapañcamena samagreṇa saṃghena ubhayataḥ saṃghena iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:220_0: maithunan ti abrahmacaryaṃ grāmyadharman ti grāmasyāpy eṣo dharmo nagarasyāpy eṣo dharmo sarvāvantasyāpi lokasya eṣo dharmo /
V05bhivin_u:220_1: pratiṣeveyā ti adhyācāreya / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣevati mānuṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānuṣyakena paṇḍakena trayāṇāṃ vraṇamukhānāṃ dhanyamārge varcamārge prasrāvamārge anyatarānyatarasmiṃ vraṇamukhe aṅgajāte aṅgajātaṃ prakṣiptaṃ ārtīyati ārtayitvā svādayati /
V05bhivin_u:220_2: ādau svādayati / madhye svādayati / paryavasāne svādayati / sukhīyati / āsvādaṃ nigamayati pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:220_3: ādau na svādayati / madhyena svādayati / paryavasāne svādayati / yāvat pārājikā bhavati / ādau na svādayati / madhye na svādayati / paryavasāne svādayati yā āsvādan nigamayati sā pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:220_4: ādau na svādayati / madhye na svādayati / paryavasāne na svādayati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:221_0: evaṃ suptasya mṛtasya aṅgajāte aṅgajātaṃ prakṣipitvā artīyati /
V05bhivin_u:221_1: peyālaṃ evaṃ amānuṣasya paṇḍakasya tiryagyonigatasya puruṣasya paṇḍakasya trayāṇāṃ vraṇamukhānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:222_0: 115. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī raktacittā puruṣaṃ darśanāya uṭṭhāpeti samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati darśanaśravaṇe deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:224_0: 117. pañca bhikṣuṇīyo pañca bhikṣūn balāt prasahyamadhyomardanti pañca bhikṣuṇīyo pārājikāyo bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:225_0: pañca bhikṣū pañca bhikṣuṇīyo balāt pragṛhyamadhyomardanti pañca bhikṣū pārājikā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:226_0: bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ anyonyaṃ vipratipadyati ubhaye pārājikā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:226_1: bhikṣuṇī śrāmaṇereṇa saha vipratipadyati bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati śrāmaṇero nāśayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:226_2: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī ārāmikena saha vipratipadyate bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:226_4: evaṃ tīrthikena / trihi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:226_5: mānuṣeṇa amānuṣeṇa tiryagyonigatena aparehi trihi dhanyamārge varcamārge prasrāvamārge /
V05bhivin_u:226_7: dvihi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati puruṣeṇa paṇḍakena ca /
V05bhivin_u:226_8: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī suptā vā bhavati mattā vā unmattā vā vistareṇa puruṣo upasaṃkramya abhiniṣīdati vā abhinipadyati vā /
V05bhivin_u:226_9: antostarati vā / sā tato utthāya ādau svādayati /
V05bhivin_u:226_10: madhye svādayati / paryavasāne svādayati pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:226_12: kin ti dāni asādiyanā / yathā bhikṣuvinaye / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī chandaso maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣevatīti /
V05bhivin_u:226_13: peyālaṃ / sā eṣā āpadyati / apy ekatyā ajñānāt / apyekatyā smṛtisaṃmoṣāt / apy ekatyākalpiyasaṃjñayā / apy ekatyā alajjikena / apy ekatyā rāgābhibhūtā doṣābhibhūtā mohābhibhūtā anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:227_0: yā punar bhikṣuṇī chandaśo maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣeveya antamasato tiryagyonigatenāpi sārdhaṃ iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asaṃvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:229_0: evaṃ dvitīyasya / tṛtīyasya / caturthasya / na kiñcin nānākaraṇaṃ yathā bhikṣuvinaye /
V05bhivin_u:231_0: 118. bhagavān chākyeṣu viharati śākyānāṃ kapilavastusmiṃ nyagrodhārāme /
V05bhivin_u:231_1: tena dāni kālena tena samayena bhagavatā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ araṇyakāni śayanāsanāni pratikṣiptāni /
V05bhivin_u:231_2: grāmāntakāni ca akṛtāni / bhikṣuṇīyo gṛhiṇām upavasitehi vasanti /
V05bhivin_u:231_3: rāṣṭrā nāma bhikṣuṇī / sā dāni aparasya sākyasya uduvasite vasati /
V05bhivin_u:231_4: sā dāni rāṣṭrā tasya śākiyakumārasya uddiśati /
V05bhivin_u:231_5: sā dāni rāṣṭrā prāsādikā darśaniyā avigatarāga /
V05bhivin_u:231_7: so dāni tāye trikkhatto devaśikaṃ upalaṅkṛtaṃ kālyaṃ madhyāhne sāyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:231_8: tāye dāni taṃ śākiya kumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃsevāya ca rāgacittam anudhvaṃsayati /
V05bhivin_u:231_9: sā dāni mlāyati pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā bhontīmapi bhojanaṃ na chando bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:232_0: 119. bhikṣū dānīṃ pṛcchanti / kena tvaṃ bhaginī rāṣṭrā pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā /
V05bhivin_u:232_1: kin te duḥkhati / kin te paryeṣāmaḥ / sarpis tailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:232_2: sā dān āha bhotu bhotu ārya evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:232_3: bhikṣuṇīyo pṛcchanti / ārye rāṣṭre kena tvam evaṃ pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā /
V05bhivin_u:232_4: kin te duḥkhati / kin te paryeṣāmaḥ / sarpis tailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:232_5: sā dān āha / bhotu bhotu āryamiśrikāyo evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:232_6: evaṃ eva upāsikā upāsikāyo / so pi śākiyakumāro āha / ārye kin te duḥkhati / kena si pāṇḍu kṛśā durvarṇā /
V05bhivin_u:232_7: ācikṣāhi kīdṛśehi atra bhaiṣajyehi vā upakaraṇehi vā artho bhaveya /
V05bhivin_u:232_8: saced asmākaṃ na bhaviṣyati prātiveśya kulāto uddhāradharmaṇā ānāpayiṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:232_10: sā dān āha bhotu dīrghāyuḥ evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:232_11: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam api āha / ārye kin te duḥkhati / kenāsi pāṇḍukṛśā durvarṇā yāvad grāmāntarāto ānāpayiṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:232_12: sā dān āha bhotu dīrghāyu evam eva vartā bhaviṣyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:232_13: so dāni śākiyakumāro āha / na idaṃ āryāye kiñcit kāyikaṃ gailāyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:232_15: sā dān āha / bāḍhaṃ caitasikaṃ gailānyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:232_16: so dān āha kathaṃ sahyaṃ bhaveya /
V05bhivin_u:232_17: sā dān āha / yadi evam icchasi evaṃ sahyaṃ bhaveya /
V05bhivin_u:233_0: 120. so dān āha / ārye kim artham ahaṃ necchāmi /
V05bhivin_u:233_1: yo dāni ahaṃ jalpāmi / ācikṣatu āryā kim ājñāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:233_2: kiṃ karomi / kīdṛśehi atra bhaiṣajyehi vā upakaraṇehi vā artho bhaveya /
V05bhivin_u:233_3: saced asmākaṃ na bhaviṣyati prātiveśyakulāto uddhāradharmaṇā ānayiṣyāmi antarāpaṇāto vā grāmāntarāto vā ānāpayiṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:233_4: ācikṣatu āryā / sā dān āha / sādhu te etam artham karohi /
V05bhivin_u:233_5: so dān āha / na ārye evaṃ vaktavyaṃ / anyāhi ahaṃ kāṣāyavasanāhi notsahāmy etaṃ arthaṃ kartuṃ prāg eva āryāya /
V05bhivin_u:233_6: āryā mama guru ca bhāvanīyā ca /
V05bhivin_u:233_7: nāham āryāya evaṃ vaktavyo / nahy aham utsahāmy etaṃ kāryaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:233_8: sā dān āha / sādhu tāva me āliṅgasva cumbasva stanodarañ ca me parimardasveti /
V05bhivin_u:233_10: sa mātrāliṅgati cumbati stanodarañ ca se parimṛśati /
V05bhivin_u:233_12: so pi dāni śākiyakumāro abhīkṣṇasaṃsargeṇa apamlāyati /
V05bhivin_u:234_0: 121. yathā bhagavān āha / nāham bhikṣavo 'nyam ekaṃ spraṣṭavyaṃ samanupaśyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:234_1: evaṃ rañjanīyam evaṃ kamanīyam evaṃ vañcanīyam evaṃ mūrcchanīyam evam adhyohāri evam antarāyakaram anuttarasya yogakṣemasyādhigamāya yathā puruṣasya strī spraṣṭavyaṃ strīyā puruṣa iti dāni tena abhikṣṇasaṃsevāya apamlāyati /
V05bhivin_u:235_0: 122. sā dāni bhikṣuṇīhi vuccati / mā ārye evaṃ karohi naivaṃ labhyā kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:235_1: sā dān āha / evaṃ mama kriyamāṇaṃ phāsu bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:235_2: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsu /
V05bhivin_u:235_5: sā dāni śabdāpitā / bhagavān āha / satyaṃ rāṣṭre evaṃ nāma tvaṃ avaśrutā avaśrutasya /
V05bhivin_u:235_6: puruṣasya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyāṃ āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyasi /
V05bhivin_u:235_7: āha / ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te rāṣṭre / nanv ahaṃ rāṣṭre anekaparyāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ kāmānāṃ kāmanandīnāṃ kāmanimnānāṃ kāmamūrcchānāṃ kāmapipāsānāṃ kāmaparidāhyānāṃ kāmādhyavasānānāṃ antam vadāmi /
V05bhivin_u:235_8: prahāṇam vadāmi / samatikramaṇaṃ vadāmi / tatra nāma tvaṃ imaṃ evaṃ rūpatvaṃ pāpam akuśalaṃ dharmaṃ adhyācarasi /
V05bhivin_u:235_9: naiṣa rāṣṭre dharma / naiṣa vinayo / naivaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ / naivaṃ kartavyaṃ / naivaṃ karato vṛddhir bhavati kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:236_0: 123. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:236_2: yāvatikā bhikṣuṇīyo kapilavastun nagaram upaniśritya viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:236_3: atha khalu bhagavān sannipatitaṃ bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ viditvā etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vistareṇārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:237_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya adho kakṣābhyām upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:238_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti / peyālaṃ / yāvad eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā ti raktacittā /
V05bhivin_u:238_4: āmoṣaṇaṃ ti cchuvaṇaṃ / parāmoṣaṇan ti vītihāro / sādiyeyā ti sātīyati sukhiyati ramīyati āsvāda nigamayati pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:239_0: pārājiketi pāraṃ nāmocyate dharmajñānaṃ / tato jīnā ojīnā saṃjīnā parihīṇā / tenāha pārājiketi /
V05bhivin_u:240_0: 124. evaṃ vistareṇa / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:240_1: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutasya paṇḍakasya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:240_2: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyati thūlaccayam āsādyati /
V05bhivin_u:240_3: sā pi eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā anavaśrutena puruṣena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyati thūlaccayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_4: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaṃ parāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya thūlaccayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_5: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā anavaśrutāya striyāya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiya deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_6: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyati thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_7: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutenapaṇḍakena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyati thūl'-accayaṃ āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_8: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutāya striyāya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_9: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati deśanāgāmi vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_10: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_11: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutāya striyāya upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādayati samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_12: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyāṃ yāvat sthūlātyayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_13: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena paṇḍakena adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāva thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_14: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutāya striyāya adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyāṃ yāvad deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_15: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsāsdayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_16: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena paṇḍakena adho jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ upari kakṣābhyām yāvat deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_17: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutāya striyāya adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyāṃ yāvat samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_18: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena puruṣeṇa adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_19: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_20: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutāyastriyāya adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_21: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena puruṣeṇa adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām yāvat samvaragāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_22: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutena paṇḍakena adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyāṃ yāvat samvaragāmivinayā tikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:240_23: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā anavaśrutāya striyāya adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādīyati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:241_0: 125 / atha dāni bhikṣuṇī lalāṭasirāṃ vedhāpayati dvitīyāya bhikṣuṇīya mūrdhni ākramitavyā yathā strī spraṣṭavyaṃ saṃjānāti na puruṣa spraṣṭavyaṃ saṃjānāti /
V05bhivin_u:241_1: atha dāni bāhuśirāṃ vindhāpayati aparāya bhikṣuṇīya bāhā grahetavyā yathā strī spraṣṭavyaṃ saṃjānāti na puruṣa spraṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:241_2: evaṃ gulphaśirā / evaṃ jānumaṇḍalādhaḥ / atha dāni gaṇḍaṃ vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayati vā upanāhāpayati vā aparāya bhikṣuṇīya ālambayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:241_3: na kṣamati sambādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā puruṣeṇa vedhāpayitum vā pāṭāpayitum vā upanāhāpayitum vā /
V05bhivin_u:241_4: sambādho nāma pradeśo upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adhaḥ kakṣābhyām /
V05bhivin_u:242_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya adho kakṣā bhyām upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:244_0: 126. bhagavān samyaksambuddho yadarthaṃ samudāgato tadartham abhisambhāvayitvā vaiśālīyām viharati /
V05bhivin_u:244_1: mahāvane kūṭāgāraśālāyāṃ / tena dāni kālena tena samayena bhagavatā bhikṣuṇīnām āraṇyakāni śayanāsanāni pratikṣiptāni /
V05bhivin_u:244_2: grāmāntikani ca akṛtāni / bhikṣuṇīyo abhyantaranagare praviśanti /
V05bhivin_u:244_4: sā dāni aparasya licchavikumārasya uduvasite vasati /
V05bhivin_u:244_5: sā dāni tasya licchavikumārasya uddeśan dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:244_6: sā dāni rāṣṭrapālā tasya devasikam upasaṃkramati kālyaṃ madhyāhne sāyam /
V05bhivin_u:244_9: tāye dāni rāṣṭrapālāya abhīkṣṇadarśanena abhikṣṇaṃ saṃsevāya ca rāgacittam anudhvaṃsayati /
V05bhivin_u:244_10: sā dāni mlāyati / peyālaṃ / yāvad guru ca bhāvanīyā ca yāvan notsahāmi /
V05bhivin_u:245_0: 127. sā dān āha / sādhu khalu tāvan me anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhāhi saṃlapāhi /
V05bhivin_u:245_1: hastaṃ me gṛhṇāhi / prahastaṃ me gṛhṇāhi / aṅguliṃ me gṛhṇāhi / anguṣṭaṃ me gṛhṇāhi / cīvaraṃ me gṛhṇāhi / ahaṃ pi te āgatam abhinandiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:245_2: āsanena upanimantrayiṣyaṃ / kāyan te anuprayacchiṣyaṃ / pīṭhikām vā āpaṇam vā karmāntam vā gamiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:245_3: so dān āha / ārye labhyā mayā etaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:245_4: so dāni tāye anto hastapāsasya tiṣṭhati /
V05bhivin_u:245_5: saṃlapati / hastena gṛhṇāti / prahaste gṛhṇāti / cīvare gṛhṇāti / sā pi taṃ āgatam abhinandati /
V05bhivin_u:245_6: āsanenopanimantrayati / kāyaṃ se nuprayacchati / saṃketaṃ vā gacchati / sāpi dāni tattakenaiva kāmacchandam vinodeti /
V05bhivin_u:245_7: so pi dāni licchavikumāro abhīkṣṇadarśanena abhīkṣṇasaṃsevāya apamlāyati /
V05bhivin_u:246_0: 128. yat tad uktaṃ bhagavatā / nāham bhikṣavo 'nyad ekarūpam api samanupaśyāmīti vistareṇa sūtraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:246_2: sā punaḥ punaḥ karoti / sā bhikṣuṇīhi vuccati / mā ārye rāṣṭrapāle evaṃ karohi /
V05bhivin_u:246_3: naivaṃ labhyā kartuṃ / sā dān āha / ken' arthan na labhyate / evam mama kriyamāṇe phāsu bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:246_4: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:246_6: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha rāṣṭrapālāṃ / sā dāni śabdāpitā / bhagavān āha / satyaṃ rāṣṭrapāle evan nāma tvaṃ avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭhasi saṃlapasi /
V05bhivin_u:246_7: peyālaṃ / yāvat saṃketaṃ gacchasi / āha / ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te rāṣṭrapāle / yāvan mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:247_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭheta vā saṃlapeta vā /
V05bhivin_u:247_1: hastagrahaṇam vā / cīvaragrahaṇam vā sādīyeya / āgatam vā abhinandeya / āsanena vā upanimantreya / kāyam vā anuprayaccheya / saṃketakṛtam vā gaccheya / iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asaṃvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:248_1: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā ti raktacittā /
V05bhivin_u:248_5: hastagrahaṇan ti haste gṛhṇiya yāvad aṅguṣṭake vā /
V05bhivin_u:248_6: cīvaragrahaṇan ti saṃghāṭīyaṃ vā uttarāsaṅge vā aṅtarevāse vā saṃkakṣikāyāṃ vā dakaśāṭikāyām vā /
V05bhivin_u:248_8: āgataṃ vā abhinandeyā ti vā svāgatan te anurāgatan te punaḥ puna āgacchesi /
V05bhivin_u:248_9: prītāsmi tavāgamanena / prahlāditam me gātraṃ tava darśanena /
V05bhivin_u:248_11: kāyaṃ se anuprayaccheyā ti yenāsau tena kāyaṃ praṇāmeta /
V05bhivin_u:248_12: saṃketakṛtaṃ gacched iti yas tasya abhīkṣṇaṃ upacāro bhaved āpaṇo vā pīṭhikā vā kṣetravastraṃ vā udakasamīpaṃ vā karmāntaṃ vā udyāyaṃ vā mārge vā tahiṃ tiṣṭhed iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā asaṃvāsyeti yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:249_0: 130. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśaṃ saṃtiṣṭhati yāvat saṃketaṃ kṛtaṃ gacchati pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:249_2: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvat saṃketakṛtam vā gacchati thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:249_4: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anavaśrutā avaśrutasya anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭhati yāvat saṃketakṛtam vā gacchati sthūlātyayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:249_6: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutena puruṣeṇa santiṣṭhati thūl'-accayam /
V05bhivin_u:249_16: atha dāni anukhajjakam āpajjati yadāṣṭau thūl'-accayā bhavanti tadā pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:249_17: atha dāni eka samāpadyitvā pratikaritvā yāvat saptamam āpadyitvā pratikaritvā aṣṭamam āpadyati na sā pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:249_18: atha dāni saptamam āpadyitvā apratikaritvā aṣṭamam āpadyati pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:250_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya anto hastapāśasya santiṣṭhed vā /
V05bhivin_u:250_1: saṃlaped vā / hastagrahaṇam vā / cīvaragrahaṇam vā sādīyeya / āgatam vā abhinandeya / āsanena vā upanimantreyeta / kāyam vā anuprayaccheya / saṃketakṛtam vā gaccheya / iyam pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsya /
V05bhivin_u:252_1: vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā / vaiśālīyaṃ dāni nagare aparasya licchavisya triyantarā dārikā jātā /
V05bhivin_u:252_2: amaṅgalyā apraśastā / teṣān dāni mātāpitṛṇām bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:252_3: ka imāṃ vivāhayiṣyati / gṛhe pi dhāryamāṇā amaṅgalyā kasyeyan dātavyā /
V05bhivin_u:252_4: apare āhaṃsuḥ / icchata yūyaṃ etāṃ dārikāṃ unnīyamānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:252_5: te dān āhaṃsuḥ / icchāmaḥ / āhaṃsuḥ / eṣātra kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī / tasyā detha sā unneṣyati / tehi dāni sā uktā / ārye 'smākaṃ triyantarā dārikā jātā adhanyā vāmaṅgalyā vāpraśastā vā /
V05bhivin_u:252_6: tām vayam ānāpeyemaḥ / unnehi vardhehi antevāsinīya te bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:252_8: tāya sā parigṛhītā / unneti vardheti / tato devasikaṃ pakvapraheṇakam ānīyati /
V05bhivin_u:252_10: hemante hemantikaṃ / varṣākāle varṣāvāsikaṃ / sā yadā mahantībhūtā tadā tāya pravrajitā /
V05bhivin_u:252_11: śikṣā deśitā / paripūraśikṣā / upasampāditā / tīvrarāgo mātṛgrāmaḥ / sā dāni kleśehi bādhyate / na sahati / sā dān āha / ārye na dāni pravrajyāyāṃ gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:252_12: kleśena bādhyāmi / kālī āha / putri duḥkho gṛhāvāsaḥ / aṅgārakarṣūpamā kāmā uktā bhagavatā /
V05bhivin_u:252_13: kin te gṛhāvāsena / sā paśyati yadi tāvad iyaṃ pratyodhāvati tato me lābhasatkāro 'ntarahāyiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:252_15: sā dāni kleśān asahantī ārāmikaparivrājakehi sārdhaṃ miśribhūtā /
V05bhivin_u:252_17: sā bhikṣuṇīhi niṣkāśīyati / tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:252_18: ārye kāli jānāsi tvam etāṃ āgārakehi parivrājakehi saha miśrībhūtāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:252_19: āha / jānāmi / evaṃ viropādāya āhaṃsuḥ / kim arthaṃ tvaṃ nārocesi / na jalpasi / paśyāmi yady aham ārocayiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:252_20: eṣā gṛhaṃ gamiṣyati / mama eṣa lābhasatkāro antarāhāyiṣyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:253_0: 132. etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:253_2: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha kāliṃ / sā śabdāpitā / tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:253_3: āha / āma bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli / asti nāma tvaṃ kāli jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ duṣṭhullāpattim āpanāṃ praticchādesi /
V05bhivin_u:253_4: yāvan naiṣa kāli dharmo naiṣa vinayo /
V05bhivin_u:253_6: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvatikā bhikṣuṇīyo vaiśālīn nagarīm upaniśritya viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:254_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ kṛtām adhyācīrṇāṃ chādeya /
V05bhivin_u:254_1: sā na pareṣām ārocayati kuvege mahājane saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:254_2: yadā sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi cyutā bhavati mṛtā niṣaṇṇā avasaṇṇā avakrāntā imasmād dharmavinayād /
V05bhivin_u:254_4: ājñāsi vatāham ārye itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye duṣṭhullāmāpatti kṛtāmadhyācīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:254_6: kin ti imāye māpare jānantū ti /
V05bhivin_u:255_1: peyālaṃ / jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya ākāravantena darśanena śravaṇena /
V05bhivin_u:255_2: duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ ti duṣṭhullānāma aṣṭānām anyatarānyatarā kṛtā adhyācīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:255_3: sā na pareṣām āroceya iti na kathayet /
V05bhivin_u:255_4: kuve ege ti ekāye / mahājane ti dvinnām trayāṇāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:256_1: mṛtā ti kālagatā / niṣaṇṇā avasaṇṇā ti gṛhiṇībhāvaṅ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:256_2: avakrāntā imasmād dharmavinayād iti anyatīrthikāyatanaṃ saṃkrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:256_3: atha sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ evaṃ vadeyā /
V05bhivin_u:256_4: ājñāsi vatāhaṃ ārye itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye duṣṭhullā-m-āpattiḥ kṛtāmadhyācīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:256_5: chāye / sāhaṃ na pareṣām ārocaye / kin ti imāye māpare jānantū ti /
V05bhivin_u:257_0: 133. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī paśyati bhikṣuṇīṃ aruṇodgate duṣṭhullām āpattim āpadyantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:257_2: sūryasyodgamanakālasamaye chādanācittaṃ pratilabhitvā aruṇamudghāte ti iyaṃ bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:257_3: evaṃ do kālikā aṣṭa parivartā kartavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:257_5: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ paśyati duṣṭhullām āpattim adhyācarantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:257_7: atha sā bhoti antevāsiṇī vā sārdhavihāriṇī vā paśyati /
V05bhivin_u:257_8: yadi ārocayiṣyāmi idānīṃ bhikṣuṇīhi niskāsiṣyatīti anunayasambandhena chādeti pārājikā bhoti /
V05bhivin_u:257_9: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī paśyati aparāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ āpattim āpadyantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:257_10: sā dāni aparāya āroceti dṛṣṭā mayā itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī duṣṭhullām āpattim adhyācarantī /
V05bhivin_u:257_11: ahaṃ paśyāmi yadi ārocayiṣyatīti dānī bhikṣuṇīhi nirdhāvayiṣyatīti mayā pi cchāditaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:257_12: sā pi paśyati yadi aham ārocayiṣyaṃ ubhaye nirdhāvayiṣyantīti cchādeti /
V05bhivin_u:257_13: sā pi pārajikā bhavati / evaṃ yattikāyo cchādenti sarvāyo pārājikā bhonti /
V05bhivin_u:257_14: eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ paśyati duṣṭhullām āpattim āpadyantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:257_15: sā aparān āroceti / itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī duṣṭhullām āpattim āpannā /
V05bhivin_u:257_16: sā dān āha / pāpaṃ kṛtan tvayā mama ārocayantīya /
V05bhivin_u:257_17: mā aparāye pi ārocayiṣyasīti thūl'-accyam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:257_18: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī paśyati bhikṣuṇīṃ duṣthullām āpattim adhyācarantīṃ /
V05bhivin_u:257_19: tāya aparāye ārocayitavyaṃ / atha dāni sā bhoti raudrā vā sāhasakārā paśyati /
V05bhivin_u:257_20: mā se jīvitāntarāyaṃ vā brahmacaryāntarāyam vā kariṣyatīti upekṣā partilabhati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:258_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīye duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ kṛtām adhyācīrṇāṃ chādeya /
V05bhivin_u:258_1: sā na pareṣām ārocayet kuvege mahājane saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:258_2: yadā sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi cyutā bhavati mṛtā niṣaṇṇā avasaṇṇā avakrāntā imasmād dharmavinayād /
V05bhivin_u:258_3: atha bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnām evam vadeya ājñāsi vatāhaṃ ārye itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye duṣṭhullā-m-āpatti kṛtāmadhyācīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:258_5: kin ti imāye māpare jānantū ti /
V05bhivin_u:258_6: iyaṃ pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:261_0: 134. bhagavān samyaksaṃbuddho yad arthaṃ samudāgato tadartham abhisambhāvayitvā /
V05bhivin_u:261_1: peyālaṃ / yāvat tehi tehi vihārehi viharan kauśāmbyām viharati ghoṣitārāme /
V05bhivin_u:261_2: āyuṣmān dāni chandako pañcānām āpattikāyānām anyatarānyatarām āpattim adhyomardati /
V05bhivin_u:261_3: so bhikṣūhi vuccati āyuṣman chandaka paśyasi etām āpattiṃ /
V05bhivin_u:261_4: so dān āha / nāhaṃ paśyāmi yūyam api naṃ paśyatha /
V05bhivin_u:261_5: bhe cyu[?]taṃ paśyantu / kim puna mama etāya duṣṭāya /
V05bhivin_u:261_7: bhagavān āha / yady eṣo bhikṣavaś chandako pañcānām āpattikāyānām anyatarānyatarām āpattim adhyomardati /
V05bhivin_u:261_8: sa tām āpattiṃ na paśyati / tena saṃgho āpattīya adarśanena utkṣepanīyaṃ karma karotu /
V05bhivin_u:261_11: tasya dāni mātā aparaṃhi bhikṣuṇīvihāre āvāsinī /
V05bhivin_u:261_12: so dāni taṃhi gatvā āha / sālohite saṃghenāham utkṣipto /
V05bhivin_u:261_14: sā dān āha / aparyā ārya cchandaka / ahan te saṃbhuñjāmi dharmasambhogena āmiṣasambhogena /
V05bhivin_u:261_16: sā dāni bhikṣuṇīhi vuccati / ārye eṣo hi ārya chandako samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinyato utkṣipto apratikṛto /
V05bhivin_u:262_0: bhagavān āha / apāpāya āryamiśrikā ahaṃ ca tāvan netaṃ bhikṣuṃ anuvartiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:262_1: kā anyā anuvartiṣyati / anuvartiṣyāmy aham etaṃ bhikṣuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:262_2: kim artham aham etaṃ kim artham aham etam nānuvartiṣye /
V05bhivin_u:262_3: etat prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:262_5: bhagavān āha / yady eṣā bhikṣuṇī chandakamātā chandakaṃ bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvartati /
V05bhivin_u:262_6: tena hi taṃ gacchatha triḥkkhatto kuvege triḥkkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:262_7: sā dāni kuvege vuccati satyaṃ tvam ārye chandakamāte āryechandakaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvartasi /
V05bhivin_u:262_8: āho ty āha / sā tvaṃ kuvege vucyasi / mā ārye chandakamāto āryachandakaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtaṃ anuvartāhi /
V05bhivin_u:262_9: yaṃ khalu te ārye chandakamāte mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣiṇīya karoti te taṃ mitrā ekā vācā gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:262_10: dve vāce avaśiṣṭe pratiniḥsara na pratiniḥsarāmītya āha /
V05bhivin_u:262_11: evam dvir api trir api / evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā yāvan na pratiniḥsarāmīty āha /
V05bhivin_u:263_0: 135. etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhagavataḥ ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:263_1: anuprāptā bhagavan āryā chandakamātā trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya na ca pratiniḥsarati /
V05bhivin_u:263_2: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha chandakamātāṃ / sā dāni śabdāpitā / bhagavān āha / satyaṃ tvaṃ chandakamāte / evan nāma tvaṃ chandakaṃ bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtaṃ saṃbhuñjasi /
V05bhivin_u:263_3: sā tvaṃ trikkhutto kuvege trikkhutto mahājane trikkhutto saṃghamadhye anuprāptā etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya na ca pratiniḥsarasi /
V05bhivin_u:263_4: ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtan te chandakamāte / nanv ahaṃ chandakamāte anekaparyāyeṇa daurvacanasyaṃ garhāmi daurvacanasya avarṇavādi tatra nāma tvaṃ kharākhakkhaṭaṃ vāmā apradakṣinagrāhiṇī /
V05bhivin_u:263_5: naiṣaś chandakamāte dharmo / naiṣa vinayo naitaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:263_7: naivaṃ karontīye vṛddhir bhavati kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
V05bhivin_u:263_8: evaṃ ca dāni tvaṃ jānantī bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam anuvartasi /
V05bhivin_u:263_9: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvartituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:264_0: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:264_1: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvatikā bhikṣuṇīyo kauśāmbinagarīm upaniśrāya viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:265_1: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya ākāravantena darśanena ākāravantena śravaṇena /
V05bhivin_u:265_3: dharmavinayato āpattīya adarśanena āpattīya apratikarmeṇa trayāṇāṃ dṛṣṭigatānām apratiniḥsargeṇa /
V05bhivin_u:266_0: apratikṛtaṃ ti apratyosāritaṃ / anuvarteyā ti āmiṣasaṃbhogena vā dharmasaṃbhogena vā saṃbhuñjeya /
V05bhivin_u:267_0: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:267_1: eṣo hi ārye bhikṣuḥ samagreṇa saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:267_2: peyālaṃ / yāvat tad eva vastuṃ pratigṛhṇeya na pratiniḥsareya yaṃ taṃ utkṣiptakaṃ bhikṣum anuvartati /
V05bhivin_u:268_1: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā iti trikkhatto kuvege mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:268_2: sā kuvege vaktavyā / satyaṃ tvaṃ itthaṃnāme itthaṃnāme bhikṣusamagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam apratikṛtam anuvartasi /
V05bhivin_u:268_3: āmo ty āha / sā dāni vaktavyā / mā ārye itthaṃnāma bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptam anuvartāhi /
V05bhivin_u:268_4: yaṃ khalu te itthannāme mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣinīya karoti /
V05bhivin_u:268_5: te taṃ mitrā ekā vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsara na pratiniḥsarāmīty āha dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam api /
V05bhivin_u:268_6: peyālaṃ / saṃghamadhye pi traivācikaṃ yāvat taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:268_7: no ca pratiniḥsareya iyam pi bhikṣuṇī pārājikā bhavaty asamvāsyā /
V05bhivin_u:269_0: pārājiketi pārājikāye āpattīye saṃkāśanā prakāśanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkarmatā prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:270_0: 137. sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege samanugrāhiyamāṇā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:270_1: trikkhatto mahājane samanugrāhiyaṃāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratinissarati vācāyām vācāyām vinayātikramam āsādayati /

V05bhivin_u:349_1: imaṃ dhvajaṃ samutsṛjya dhavajahāro so kahiṃ gataḥ // [11] //
V05bhivin_u:350_0: ya imaṃ pariharet kāyaṃ aśvaṃ bhadram ca vāṇijo /

V05bhivin_u:351_0: ya imāṃ pariharen nāvaṃ asmimāne mahārṇave /
V05bhivin_u:351_1: imān nāvaṃ samutsṛjya nāviko so kahiṃ gataḥ // [13] //

V05bhivin_u:354_1: samvegajātās tāḥ kanyāḥ dṛṣṭvā tā upasaṃkramet // [16] //

V05bhivin_u:361_1: yo dhīro bandhanān muktaḥ tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [1] //
V05bhivin_u:362_1: dhyāyantaṃ vṛkṣamūlasmi tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [2] //

V05bhivin_u:363_1: kṣīṇāsravam arhantaṃ (!) tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [3] //
V05bhivin_u:364_0: yasya śailopamaṃ cittaṃ sthitan na anukampati /
V05bhivin_u:364_1: yo vimuktiṃ saṃjāneyā tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [4] //
V05bhivin_u:365_0: yasyā ure ca pāre ca madhye nāsti na kiñcana /
V05bhivin_u:365_1: akiñcanam adānaṃ ca tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [5] //
V05bhivin_u:366_0: vāri puṣkarapatre vā ārāgre iva sarṣapaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:366_1: yo na lipyati kāmeṣu tan me śakra varaṃ dada // [6] //

V05bhivin_u:372_1: eṣa śakra viṣaṇṇo si paṇkevāsi jaradgavaḥ // [10] //
V05bhivin_u:374_0: upāsikā vo kanyāyo api ca ye upāsakā /

V05bhivin_u:377_0: 149.atha bhagavān tāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pūrve nivāsapratisaṃyuktāṃ pratijñākathāṃ vyākārṣīt /
V05bhivin_u:378_0: kadāhaṃ vīṇāṃ vā madhurāṃ saptatantrīyutāṃ manoramām /
V05bhivin_u:378_1: dharmaṃ pravyāhariṣyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [1] //

V05bhivin_u:382_1: saṃghāṭīṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyaṃ tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [3] //
V05bhivin_u:383_1: cittaṃ ṛjuṃ kariṣyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [4] //
V05bhivin_u:384_0: samanvāharasi paṭaccare / evam hy etad bhagavan / eṣāpi tatraivāsi / etasyāpy etaṃ praṇidhānam abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:385_1: pāṇinā parimārjiṣyaṃ tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [5] //

V05bhivin_u:387_0: samanvāharasi kṛśagautami / evam etad bhagavan / eṣāpi tatraivāsi / etasyā pretaṃ praṇidhānam abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:388_1: saṃghaṃ parihariṣyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [7] //
V05bhivin_u:389_0: kadāhaṃ candro ca vimalo viprasanno anāvilo /
V05bhivin_u:389_1: śuddhaṃ cittaṃ adhiṣṭhihiṣyaṃ tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [8] //

V05bhivin_u:391_1: saṃghe dānāni dāsyāmi tat kadā nu bhaviṣyati // [9] //
