V05bhivin_u:397_0: 150. tatra tāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ cakṣur gocaraṃ nāsti /
V05bhivin_u:398_0: tena kālena tena samayena aparā hy etā bhikṣuṇīyo kṛkiṇo rājñaḥ sapta dhītaro abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:398_1: atha śuklā bhikṣuṇī gṛheṇa gṛhaṃ bhāṣaṇāya nīyati /
V05bhivin_u:398_2: sā dāni apareṇa gṛhabhāṣaṇāya nītā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā /
V05bhivin_u:398_3: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato ārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:398_4: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha śuklāṃ / sā dāni śabdāpitā / bhagavān / āha / satyaṃ śukle / evaṃ nāma tvaṃ bhikṣuṇībhir vinā vipravasasi /
V05bhivin_u:398_5: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi vinā vipravasituṃ ekāṃ rātrim pi /
V05bhivin_u:399_1: vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā / bhikṣuṇīyo dāni adhvānaṃ gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:399_2: tahin dāni aparā bhikṣuṇī jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā sārthāt parihīṇā /
V05bhivin_u:399_3: sā rātriṃ vipravustā / tāya dāni kaukṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ / kaukṛtyena bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vistareṇārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:399_4: yāvat mahāprajāpatī pi gautamī bhagavato ārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:400_1: vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā / kāpilavāstavyehi śākiyehi saṃsthāgāraḥ kārāpitaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:400_2: na co aciraniṣṭhitaḥ / tehi dāni tahiṃ rakṣapālāḥ sthāpitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:400_3: na kasyacit praveśo dātavyo ti bhagavān prathamaṃ paribhokṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:400_5: atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kośalasya putro virūḍhako nāma kumāraḥ kapilavastuṃ gatako mātulānām antike śikṣāmāṇāya /
V05bhivin_u:400_6: so dāni tehi rakṣapālehi pramattehi saṃsthāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ krīḍanāya /
V05bhivin_u:400_7: so dāni tehi rakṣapālehi anyehi ca śākiyehi dṛṣṭo /
V05bhivin_u:400_8: te dāni ruṣitā itikitikāya putra dāsīputra kahiṃ praviṣṭo 'si ti /
V05bhivin_u:400_9: ocapeṭitaḥ / ekena hastena bāhāyāṃ gṛhītvā dvitīyena hastena grīvāyāṃ saṃsthāgārād bahiś choritaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:400_10: virūḍhako utkaṇṭhitaḥ / taṃ dāni tehi śākiyehi saṃsthāgāra puruṣamātrābhūmiṃ khānāpayitvā navena pāṃsunā pūrayitvā gandhodakena siktaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:400_11: virūḍhakena śrutaṃ / sa sutarāṃ ruṣitaḥ / āghātacittam utpāditavān / yady ahaṃ rājyaṃ pratilabheyaṃ śākiyānāṃ nidhanaṃ kariṣye /
V05bhivin_u:400_12: so dāni śrāvastīyam āgataḥ / tasya duḥkhaśāyī nāma baṭukaḥ sevako /
V05bhivin_u:400_13: so dāni tasyāha / yadāhaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhito bhaveyaṃ tadā me smārayiṣyasi śākiyānām antam gamiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:400_15: kadāci dāni rājā prasenajit kośalo udyānabhūmin nirgataḥ /
V05bhivin_u:400_19: rājā prasenajit kośalo na bhūyaḥ praveśaṃ labhati /
V05bhivin_u:400_21: yasya bhavanto gṛheṇārthaḥ putradāreṇa cārthaḥ sa praviśatu nagaraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:400_22: evam akriyamāṇe yuṣmākaṃ putradāraṃ vyasanam āpādayiṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:400_23: amātyā rājānaṃ pṛcchanti / kim ājñāpayati devo yudhyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:400_24: rājā bravīti / mā yudhyantu bhavantaḥ / idānim vā paścād vā etasyaiva etaṃ rājyaṃ gacchatha /
V05bhivin_u:400_25: etasyaiva ājānatha / mā paścād yuṣmākaṃ duḥkhaṃ utpādayiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:400_27: rājā dāni ātmatṛtīyo, udyānabhūmīyaṃ saṃsthito pānīyapālo mallī ca rājā dṛṣṭasatyo na paritasyati /
V05bhivin_u:400_28: vastu vistareṇa kartavyaṃ / yāvat virūḍhako mātyān āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:400_29: yo dāni bhaṇe rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ jugupseya tasya kiṃ daṇḍaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:400_30: āmātyā āhaṃsuḥ / vadho mahārāja / rāja āha / pūrvam ahaṃ kumārabhūtaḥ śākiyānāṃ saṃsthāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ tehi mama jugupsāya saṃsthāgāraṃ puruṣasaṃsthāgāraṃ puruṣamātraṃ khānāpayitva pāṃsunā pūrayitvā kṣīragandhodakena bhittiyo tāyo dhovitāyo? mayā teṣāṃ vairaṃ pratikartavyaṃ yadi bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ nānukampati /
V05bhivin_u:400_31: atha bhagavān anukampati / nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi kiñcit pratikartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:400_32: āmātyā āhaṃsuḥ / śrūyate mahārāja / śramaṇo gautamo vītarāgaḥ / vītarāgaś ca jñātīnāṃ nirapekṣā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:400_33: udyujyantu mahārāja / śakṣyāma vayaṃ teṣāṃ nigrahītuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:400_34: bhagavān dāni virūḍhakasya imam evaṃ rūpaṃ cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāya kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīye nagarīye piṇḍāya caritvā anyataraṃ śākhoṭavṛkṣaṃ niśrāya niṣīdati sma /
V05bhivin_u:400_35: atha khalu rājā virūḍhako caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhayitvā hastikāyaṃ aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ śrāvastyāṃ nagaryāṃ niryāti kapilavastuṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:400_36: adrākṣīd rājā virūḍhako bhagavantaṃ śākhoṭakavṛkṣaṃ niśrāya niṣaṇṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca puna yena bhagavāṃs tena hastināgaṃ prerayati /
V05bhivin_u:400_37: atha khalu rājā virūḍhako yāvad eva yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā hastināgāt pratyāruhya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:400_39: aśvatthanyagrodhasaptaparṇādyāḥ śobhanāś ca śītalāś ca tān utsṛjya itarasya pratyavarasya viralapatrasya śākhoṭakavṛkṣasyādhastān niṣaṇṇaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:400_40: bhagavān āha / śītalā mahārāja jñātīnāṃ cchāyā /
V05bhivin_u:400_41: atha khalu rājño virūḍhakasya etad abhavat /
V05bhivin_u:400_43: tato yeva pratinivartayitvā śrāvastīn nagaram anupraviṣṭaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:401_0: bhagavān dāni śrāvastīyaṃ yathābhiramyaṃ viharitvā kapilavastuṃ nagaraṃ prakrāmi /
V05bhivin_u:401_1: yāvac chākyān vinayati / vinayitvā tatraiva viharati nyagrodhārāme /
V05bhivin_u:402_1: rājā dāni virūḍhako śākīyān vadhitvā śākiyakanyāyo ādāya śrāvastīṃ pratigataḥ tadyathā /
V05bhivin_u:402_2: cārū ca nāma / upacārū ca nāma / sumanā ca nāma / manoharā / sālavatī / abhayā ca nāma / so dāni sārdhaṃ krīḍanto ramanto paricārayantaḥ abhikṣṇaṃ vadati /
V05bhivin_u:402_3: nihatā me grāmakaṇṭakāḥ / śākiyajanapadakaṇṭakāḥ / nihatā me pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:403_0: atha khalv abhayā rājadhītā rājānaṃ virūḍhakam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:403_1: mā deva evaṃ vada nihatā me grāmakaṇṭakāḥ śākiyā iti /
V05bhivin_u:403_4: evaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ / dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ / buddhe avetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:403_6: prāṇātipātāt prativiratāḥ / yāvad āryakānteḥ śīleḥ samanvāgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:403_7: santi deva śākiyāḥ śrotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino nāgāminas te devena adūṣakā anaparādhino jīvitād vyavaropitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:404_0: 154. atha rājā virūḍhakaḥ kupitaḥ yāvat kāraṇāntikaṃ mahāmātram āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:404_1: tvaṃ hi bhaṇe puruṣa mama bhogehi jāyayasi /
V05bhivin_u:404_2: mama sukhena jīvasi / kanyāyo śākiyāyinīyo mama pratyarthikāyo pratrasitāyo /
V05bhivin_u:404_3: mama jīvitaṃ necchanti / mama sukhaṃ nābhinandanti / so 'ham antaḥpuramadhyagato pi etāsām aviśvastaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:404_5: tena hi bhaṇe mahāmātra imāyo śākiyāyinīyo daṇḍahatāyo kṛtvā karṇanāsāhastapādacchinnāyo kṛtvā taptena telena kāyaṃ pariṣiñcitvā jīvantikāyo evaṃ parikhāyāṃ cchorayā /
V05bhivin_u:404_7: yan dāni ahaṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ āsi darśanaṃ pi na labhamāno tāyo etāyo mama hastagatāyo yan nūnam aham etāhi saha krīḍeyaṃ rameyaṃ paricārayeyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:404_8: so dāni tāhi sārdhaṃ svake gṛhe pravicārayati /
V05bhivin_u:404_9: aśrauṣīd rājā virūḍhako kāraṇāntikas tāhi sārdhaṃ krīḍati yāvan na ca pi yathoktaṃ karotīti /
V05bhivin_u:404_15: tāyo tatra duḥkhaṃ tīvrāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti /
V05bhivin_u:404_19: hā ramaṇīyo jambudvīpaḥ / sūktavādī bhagavān iti paridevanti /
V05bhivin_u:405_0: atha khalu bhagavān kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīn nagarīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:405_2: kasyaiṣā gautamī mātā / mahato janakāyasya nirghoṣo yāvad rājñā virūḍhakena ṣaṇṇāṃ śākiyāyinīnāṃ yāvat tasya kṛpaṇena yāvan sūktavādī bhagavān iti krandanti /
V05bhivin_u:405_3: sādhu bhagavān arthakāmo jñātīnām anukampyārthaṃ upasaṃkrāmatu /
V05bhivin_u:405_4: apy eva nāma bhagavataḥ sammukhād dharmaṃ śruṇitvā api svargopigā bhaveṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:406_0: 155. atha khalu bhagavāṃ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ samanvāharati sma /
V05bhivin_u:406_1: atha khalu śakro devānām indraḥ śacim āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:406_2: eṣa śaci bhagavān jñātīnām upasaṃkramati anukampārthaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:406_3: gaccha śaci tāyo śākiyāyinīyo parikhāyā uddharitvā saṃprajānaṃ niṣīdāpehi vastreṇācchādehi bhagavān upasaṃkramiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:406_4: atha khalu śacī tāyo śākiyāyinīyo parikhāyā uddharitvā saṃprajānan niṣīdāpayitvā vastreṇācchāditā /
V05bhivin_u:407_0: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat tāyomaindryā spharitvā yat kiñcit kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca duḥkhavedanāgataṃ sarvaṃ taṃ pratiprasraṃbheti /
V05bhivin_u:407_1: bhikṣūn āmantrayati / tṛpyatāṃ bhikṣavo bhagavatīṣu ko bhikṣavo bhavam abhinandeya ko upādiyeya anyatra bālapṛthagjanānāṃ andhānāṃ acakṣukānāṃ paśyatha /
V05bhivin_u:407_2: bhikṣavaḥ etāyo śākiyāyinīyo manuṣyakehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi krīḍitvā ramitvā pravicārayitvā etarhi jñātikṣaye ca bhogakṣaye ca karmasya ca sammukhībhāvād duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti /
V05bhivin_u:408_1: sacen manyatha bhaginīyo yad idaṃ yuṣmākaṃ hasto ca pādo ca chinno api tu te vedayanti vā na vā /
V05bhivin_u:408_2: no hīdaṃ bhagavan / asti ca tatpratyayā duḥkhā vedanā /
V05bhivin_u:408_3: evaṃ hy etad bhagavan sacen manyatha bhaginīyo cakṣuḥ svabhāvaṃ vedayati /
V05bhivin_u:408_4: yāvad asti ca tatpratyayā duḥkhā vedanā /
V05bhivin_u:408_5: evaṃ hy etad bhagavan / evam aśiṣṭāny āyatanāni / evaṃ skandhadhātavaḥ / evaṃ keśā romā nakhā / evaṃ sarvā aśubhapālī / evaṃ ca punar duḥkhā vedanā parādhīnā parapratibaddhā pratyayādhīnā pratyayapratibaddhā iti viditvā dvā triṃśatīhi ākārehi prakṛti bhinnaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:408_6: saṃskārapuñjaḥ parijñeyaḥ / ataś ca bhaginīyo ārya śrāvaka imesāṃ pañcopādānaskandhānāṃ nātmānaṃ samanupaśyati /
V05bhivin_u:408_8: idam avocat bhagavān / yāvat tāyo paṭa śākiyāyinīyo dhītāṃ anāgāmitāṃ sākṣāt kuryuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:408_9: pañcānāñ ca bhikṣuśatānam anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimucyeyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:408_10: anekeṣāñ ca devatāśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣu viśuddhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:409_0: 156. athāyuṣmān vāgīśas tasyām eva parṣadi yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:411_0: śūnyam asāram kañ ca kāyaṃ viditvā
V05bhivin_u:413_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
V05bhivin_u:413_1: kiṃ bhagavann imāhi śākiyāyinīhi purā pāpaṃ karma kṛtam yena etāyo evaṃ duḥkhām vedanām vedayanti /
V05bhivin_u:413_2: bhagavān āha / bhūtapūrvam ānanda etāyo śākiyāyinīyo ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ ṣaḍ gaṇikāyo abhūvan /
V05bhivin_u:413_3: ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ kālo nāma pratyekabhuddho abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:413_4: so dāni piṇḍāya caranto tāhi gaṇikāhi ukto /
V05bhivin_u:413_5: ayaṃ dāni śramaṇo svayaṃ kāmān paribhuñjati /
V05bhivin_u:413_6: kāmānāṃ cāvarṇaṃ bhāṣati / tāhi hāsyābhiprāyāhi viheṭhanābhiprāyāhi anyehi duruktehi vacanapathehi obhartsito aṅgāramallakehi cāvakīrṇaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:413_7: so dāni ānanda pratyekabuddho duḥkhāya vedanāya spṛṣṭaḥ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanto kāyena ca jīvitena ca ardiyanto tatraiva vihāya samabhyudgamya anupādāya parinivṛtaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:413_8: pūrvādhiṣṭhitena ca svakena tejodhātunā tasya śarīraṃ vyāpinaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:413_9: tāyo dāni gaṇikāyo bhītayo pāpakam asmābhiḥ karmopacitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:413_10: bahu apuṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ / īdṛśo mahābhāgo ṛṣir viheṭhitaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:413_16: evaṃ ca praṇidheṃsuḥ / anāgatam adhvānam vayam etādṛśaṃ śāstāram ārāgayemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:413_18: tān vayam api lapsyāma iti / tāyo etāyo tena pāpena karmeṇa kṛtena yāvan narakeṣūpapannāyo etāyo tahiṃ bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkham anubhaveṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:413_19: etāhi ānanda bālapṛthagjanāhi hasantīhi pāpakarma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:413_21: yam etāhi sā pūjā kṛtā vipratisāraś cotpāditaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:413_22: yaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ anāgatam adhvānaṃ etādṛśaṃ śastāram ārāgayemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:413_23: yeṣān dharmāṇām ayaṃ lābhī / tān vayam api lapsyāma iti / yāvat pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ yāvat tatra parinirvāyinyaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:413_25: kathaṃ caināṃ dhārayāmi / bhagavān āha / tasmāt tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ kāraṇavaipulyan nāma dhāraya idam avocat /
V05bhivin_u:414_1: kāścid anto nagare nilīnāḥ kāścid bahir nirgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:414_3: tāsāṃ kaurkṛtyaṃ / yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi anāpattiḥ akāmikāye nagararuddhāye /
V05bhivin_u:415_3: vyādhidurbalā / sārthāto parihīṇā ti / bhikṣuṇīyo atikrāntāyo / tāyo dāni kaukṛtyaṃ / kaukṛtyena mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:415_5: bhagavān āha / tena hi anāpattiḥ / akāmikāya / atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:415_6: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:416_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā ekarātram pi vipravaseya anyatrasamayena /
V05bhivin_u:417_2: ekaṃ rātram pi vipravaseyā ti aruṇamudagame ca anyatrasamaye /
V05bhivin_u:417_4: jarāburbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā nagaroparodho vā /
V05bhivin_u:417_6: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī anto nagarato bahirdhā nirdhāvati bahirdhāto vā anto nagaraṃ praviśati /
V05bhivin_u:417_8: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sasūrye vinā bhūtā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā aruṇamudghāteti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:417_9: astamite sūrye vinā bhūtā aruṇamudghātayati thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:417_10: bhikṣuṇīvihāre anyatra vā sarvāhi anto hastapāśasya pratikramitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:418_0: atha khalu yāme yāme purime yāme samavadhānaṃ na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:418_1: madhyame yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:418_2: paścime yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:419_0: atha dāni dvibhūmakaṃ bhavati ekā heṣṭhime pratikramati aparā uparime /
V05bhivin_u:420_0: yā punabhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhi vinā ekarātram pi vipravasiya anyatrasamaye /
V05bhivin_u:420_2: nagaro parodhe vā ruddhā bhavati ayam atra samayo /
V05bhivin_u:422_1: rājagṛhe dāni aparasya abhaṭagaṇasya sudinnikā nāma bhāryā taruṇī /
V05bhivin_u:422_2: prāsādikā darśanīyā / so dāni kālagato / sā strī puruṣeṇārthikā / sa devaro saṃkaletukāmo / sā strī striṇām āha / āryamiśrikā ahaṃ puruṣeṇa anarthikā /
V05bhivin_u:422_4: aparā strī āha / icchasi muccituṃ / sā dān āha / icchāmi / sā āha / gaccha śrāvastīṃ / taṃhi dāni kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī prativasati /
V05bhivin_u:422_5: sā te pravrājayiṣyati / sā dāni nirdhāvitā / śrāvastīṃ gatā / sā bhikṣuṇīvihāraṃ gatvā pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:422_8: sā tām upasaṃkramitvā āha / icchāmi ārye pravrajituṃ / sā tāya pravrajitā upasaṃpāditā /
V05bhivin_u:422_10: na labhati / so dāni śṛṇoti / śrāvastīyaṃ kālī nāma śrāmaṇikā /
V05bhivin_u:422_11: tāye pravrājiteti / so dāni puruṣo anupūrveṇa śrāvastīṃ gatvā pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:422_13: aparāhi darśita eṣo ti / so tahiṃ praviśetivā / pṛcchati yāvād āha katamā āryā kālīti sā dān āha /
V05bhivin_u:422_14: ahaṃ / so dān āha / prāptakālan nāma āryāye mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:422_15: sā dān āha / kutaḥ punas tvaṃ dīrghāyuḥ / so dān āha / rājagṛhāto / sā dān āha / caṇḍāyuṣo nas tvaṃ nagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:422_16: sāntevāsinī nām āha / ānetha saṃghāṭiṃ yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ bandhāpayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:422_18: yāvad iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca bandhāpayeya iti /
V05bhivin_u:422_19: so manuṣyo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca yāvad bahir gatvā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mahājanakāyasyārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:422_20: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryām ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayati mama ca bhandhanena santarjeti /
V05bhivin_u:422_21: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:422_23: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha kāliṃ / sā dāni śabdāpitā / etad eva sarvaṃ pṛcchīyati / yāvad ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli / evan nāma tvaṃ anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:422_24: tena hi na kṣamati anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:423_0: bhikṣuṇīyo āhaṃsuḥ / paśya bhagavan katham iyaṃ kālīya pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā /
V05bhivin_u:423_2: bhagavān āha / na ceṣā bhikṣuṇīyo kālīya etarhy eva pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā /
V05bhivin_u:424_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo iyam eva nagarī vārāṇasī /
V05bhivin_u:424_1: iyaṃ strī rātrau dārikāṃ skandhenādāya gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:424_4: tāya striyāya sā dārikā capeṭāya āhatā /
V05bhivin_u:424_5: eko te siṃho khādito etam pi khāditukāmāsi /
V05bhivin_u:424_6: siṃhaḥ paśyati / yādṛśī eṣā strī dhvāṅkṣā ca mukharā ca khādaty /
V05bhivin_u:424_7: eṣā mamāyīti / bhītaḥ prapalāyati / purato markaṭaḥ āgatvā siṃhaṃ pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:424_9: siṃho jalpati / bhayaṃ me upatannaṃ / vānaraḥ pṛcchati / kīdṛśaṃ bhayaṃ / siṃho vistareṇācikṣati / so jalpati / naivaṃ vaktavyaṃ / siṃhas tvaṃ mṛgarāja / kas tvāṃ prahariṣyati / āgacchāhi nivartāhi / sa necchati / siṃho vānareṇa keśehi gṛhītaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:424_10: āgacchāhīti / sā dārikā dṛṣṭvā praruditā / sā strī jalpati mā rodāhi dārike /
V05bhivin_u:424_11: eṣo tava mātuḥ kenānīto keśehi gṛhītvā /
V05bhivin_u:424_12: idāniṃ yan naṃ icchasi taṃ se khādāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:424_13: siṃhaḥ paśyati / mā haivaṃ saṃketakṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:424_14: evam evānīyānīya deti / eṣāpi khādati / yat tāvad ahaṃ ekaṃ vāraṃ prapalānaḥ kiṃ bhūyo nivartitaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:424_15: so dāni tasya markaṭasya avadhunitvā prapalānaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:426_0: bhagavān āha / syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā strī abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:426_1: naitad evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ / iyam eva sā kālī strī abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:426_2: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā dārikā ti /
V05bhivin_u:426_3: naitad evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ / iyam eva sā sudinnikā dārikā abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:426_4: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyo so siṃho abhūṣīti /
V05bhivin_u:426_5: naitad evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ / eṣo so manuṣyo siṃho abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:427_0: 159. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:427_1: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:428_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:429_1: anujñāpakehi ananujñātām iti avūḍhāya dārikāya mātāpitarau anujñāpakā /
V05bhivin_u:429_4: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādyati /
V05bhivin_u:429_6: upasaṃpādeti saṃghātiśeṣo eṣā kācit pravrajyāpekṣā āgacchati praṣṭavyā /
V05bhivin_u:429_7: anujñātāsi anujñāpakehi / yadi tāvad āha nahīti / avūḍhā vaktavyā / mātāpitarau anujānāpayitvā āgacchāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:429_8: vūḍhā vaktavyā patidevarau śvaśruśvaśurāv anujānāpayitvā āgacchāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:430_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:432_3: taṃhi dāni aparasya mallasya bhāryā parapuruṣeṇa sārdham abhicarati /
V05bhivin_u:432_4: so dān āha / asuke virama / ato doṣo / 'to mā te aham evañ ca evañ ca asat kariṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:432_5: sā dāni duṣṭā na viramati / mariṣyāmy ahaṃ / na punar aham ato doṣato viramiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:432_6: tena sā sahoḍhaṃ gṛhītvā āsane upanāmitā /
V05bhivin_u:432_7: iccheyam ahaṃ bhavanto imāṃ svadharmeṇa lambhiyamānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:432_9: yā strī anyena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ abhicarati /
V05bhivin_u:432_10: sā saptadivasāni dānavisargaṃ kārapetvā ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭīyati /
V05bhivin_u:432_11: āsanikā āhaṃsuḥ / dinnā bhavatu svadharme labhehi /
V05bhivin_u:432_12: tena dāni puruṣeṇa gṛhaṃ nayitvā uktā /
V05bhivin_u:432_13: itikitikāya dhīte dada yat te asti ca nāsti ca /
V05bhivin_u:432_14: sapta divasāni ahaṃ te ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:432_15: sā dāni ubhayato jñātisaṃghaṃ sannipātetvā annaṃ pānaṃ khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ samudānīya rodati /
V05bhivin_u:432_16: striyo āhaṃsuḥ / kiṃ ruditena tvayaiva tathā ceṣṭitaṃ yena tvam evaṃ duḥkham anubhaviṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:432_17: sā dān āha / nāhaṃ karomi / mariṣyan ti / api tu ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:432_18: evaṃ rodāmi / aparā āha / icchasi tvaṃ muccituṃ / sā dān āha / icchāmi / āha / gaccha śrāvastīṃ / tahiṃ kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī / sā te pravrājayiṣyati / sā tasyā vacanaṃ śrutvā janasya khādyantasya pibantasya pramattasya yathā vā tathā vā nirdhāvitvā anupūrveṇa pṛcchapṛcchikāya śrāvastīm āgatā /
V05bhivin_u:432_19: pṛcchati / katamo 'tra bhikṣuṇīvihāro / aparāhi darśitaḥ / sā dāni praviśitvā pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:432_20: katamā āryakālī / aparāhi ākhyātā / eṣā ti / sā tām upasaṃkramya āha / icchāmy āryāya pravrājīyamānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:432_21: sā dān āha / anujñātāsi anujñāpakehi / sā dān āha / ke puna ārye anujñāpakāḥ / āha / avūḍhāye dārikāye mātāpitarau /
V05bhivin_u:432_23: āha / tadā eṣāham anujñātā / yadāhaṃ gopāṭikāya nisṛṣṭā sunisṛṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:432_24: āha / putriṇi yā tvaṃ nisṛṣṭā sunisṛṣṭā yā tvaṃ gopāṭikāyāṃ nisṛṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:432_26: so manuṣyo mārgayati / gopāṭikāya pāṭiṣyāmīti na labhasi /
V05bhivin_u:432_27: so dāni śṛṇoti / śrāvastīyaṃ kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:432_28: tāya pravrājitā / śrāvastīm āgatvā pṛcchati / katamo 'tra bhikṣuṇīvihāro / aparehi ākhyāto eṣo ti yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:432_29: sa tahiṃ praviśitvā / āryā kālī nāma / āha / kim kartavyaṃ / prāptan nāmāryāya mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭām pravrājayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:432_30: sā dān āha / kutas tvaṃ / āha / āmalakakalyato / āha / caṇḍāyu coras tvam ocorakas tvam ocaritukāmo tvaṃ śrāvastīyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:432_31: na tvaṃ jānāsi nityaviruddhāḥ śrāvasteyāḥ āmalakakalyāś ca /
V05bhivin_u:432_33: ānehi tāva samaghāṭim yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ rājakule bhandhāpemi /
V05bhivin_u:432_34: so manuṣyo paśyati / yādṛśī iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca /
V05bhivin_u:432_35: bhandhāpeyaṃsi / eṣa so dāni puruṣo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca /
V05bhivin_u:432_36: so dāni puruṣo bhikṣuṇī nāṃ mahājanakāyasya ca puro ojjhāyati /
V05bhivin_u:432_37: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryāñ ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājeti /
V05bhivin_u:432_39: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:433_0: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli / evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:433_1: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:434_2: yāvad anyā tāva mayā īdṛśī yeva pravrājitā /
V05bhivin_u:434_5: sā dāni aparāparāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām allīnā na kācit pravrājeti /
V05bhivin_u:434_7: so manuṣyo mārgati / gopāṭikāya pāṭiṣyan ti / na labhati / tena śrutaṃ śrāvastyāṃ tīrthikehi pravrājitā /
V05bhivin_u:434_8: so dān āha / idānīṃ sā itikitikāya dhītā sumahatā dṛṣṭadhārmikena ca vadhena /
V05bhivin_u:434_10: so punar na gaveṣati na pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:434_11: sā pi dāni tena tīrthikabhāvena tīrthikabhāvenārtīyati /
V05bhivin_u:434_13: taṇḍulodakañ ca pibanti / sthālīdhovanañ ca pibanti / nagnā ahrīkā anotrāpiṇo istrikāmā pi dūṣenti /
V05bhivin_u:434_14: sā strī bhikṣuṇīnām āha / moha bhāginī asmākaṃ pravrajyā gartasmi patitā /
V05bhivin_u:434_15: nirayasmi patitā / prapātasmi patitā / uttarayātha māṃ / anukampayatha māṃ / uddharatha māṃ / anukampayatha māṃ / pravrājetha māṃ / tā dāni necchanti / sā dāni mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye allīnā /
V05bhivin_u:434_17: bhagavān āha / labhyā / yas tatrāvarṇaḥ sa tīrthikeṣu gataḥ /
V05bhivin_u:434_18: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:435_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayed anyatra samaye /
V05bhivin_u:436_1: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:436_2: vadhyām iti ghātyāṃ / viditān ti ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya mātṛpakṣasya pitṛpakṣasya ca /
V05bhivin_u:437_0: jñāti daṇḍaprāptāṃ ti / jñātayo nāma kṣatriyāṅ brāhmaṇāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ambaṣṭhavaidehāḥ bhaṭanāḥ kuṅkumālāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:437_2: keṣāñcit kīṭena vā kāliñjena vā veṭhayitvā dahyati /
V05bhivin_u:437_3: keṣāñcit vālukāghaṭakaṃ kaṇṭhe badhvā udake praveśiyati /
V05bhivin_u:437_6: keṣāñcit taptaṃ phālaṃ vraṇamukhe anuśrotaṃ prakṣipīyati /
V05bhivin_u:438_1: kṣatriyāṇāṃ palālena śarehi ca veṭhayitvā dahyati /
V05bhivin_u:438_2: abhīrāṇām vālukāya ghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe bhadhvā udake prakṣipati /
V05bhivin_u:438_4: karṇanāsā vā chidyanti / taptam vā phālaṃ anuśrote vraṇamukhe prakṣipīyanti /
V05bhivin_u:439_1: anyatra samaye ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:440_0: anyatīrthikapūrvā bhavati / anyatīrthikā nāma / carakaparivrājakanirgranthājīvakatredaṇḍikāḥ mākandikāḥ gudugudukāḥ gautamadharmacintakāḥ vṛddhaśrāvakaḥ dakatṛtīyakāḥ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:441_0: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti daṇḍaprāptāṃ pravrajayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:441_2: upasampādeti saṃghātiśeṣā / tena bhagavān āha / yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayet /
V05bhivin_u:441_3: anyatra samaye / tatrāyaṃ samayaḥ / anyatīrthikapūrvā bhavati / ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko /
V05bhivin_u:444_1: atha saṃbahulā striyo nadīyam ajirāvatīyaṃ snāyanti /
V05bhivin_u:444_3: sā tāvad ekānte cīvarakāṇi nikṣipya bāhubhyāṃ pratīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:444_4: tā dāni striyo āhaṃsuḥ / eṣā āryā sthūlanandā āgacchatīti /
V05bhivin_u:444_5: sā kayadhānake muhūrtam viśramitvā punar evāgatā /
V05bhivin_u:444_6: striyo āhaṃsuḥ / eṣā āryā sthūlanandā āgatā / aticāpalam āryāya kṛtaṃ / kathaṃ tvam bāhubhyāṃ tarasi /
V05bhivin_u:444_7: tā dāni striyo ojjhāyitāḥ / etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:444_9: mahāprajāpatī gautami bhagavato āroceti yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:444_10: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande / evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ ekākinī nadīṃ tarasi /
V05bhivin_u:444_11: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tarituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:445_0: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:445_1: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:446_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tare ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko /
V05bhivin_u:447_2: nadīti yā bahiḥ sīmāto pravahantī bahiḥ sīmām upeti /
V05bhivin_u:447_5: yāvatā ca etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadīn taranti anto hastapāśe taritavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:447_8: athavaikā madhye tiṣṭhati aparā taranti thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:447_9: yāvad evam aparāparanti sarvāḥ thūl'-accayam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:447_10: etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadyāṃ snāyanti ante hastapāśena snātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:448_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tareya / ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo //
V05bhivin_u:451_1: tahiṃ kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī grāmacārikāṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:451_2: tasyā gatāya antevāsinīye bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena utkṣepanīyakarma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:451_4: sā dān āha / ārye saṃghena utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:451_6: sā dān āha / tūṣṇīkā bhava yāvat bhikṣuṇīyo sannipātayanti /
V05bhivin_u:451_7: sā dān āha / sannipātetha āryamiśrikāyo / sā dāni anyadā cānyadā ca yadā grāmacārikāṃ caritvā āgatā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:451_9: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo sannipatathety uktā śīghraṃ śīghraṃ sannipatitāḥ kiñcid vaibhaṅgikaṃ dāsyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:451_10: sā dān āha / śṛṇotu me āryamiśrikā saṃgho /
V05bhivin_u:451_11: iyaṃ itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī / tasyāḥ saṃghena utkeṣepanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:451_12: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosareya /
V05bhivin_u:451_13: ovayikā eṣā jñaptiḥ / śṛṇotu me āryamiśrikā saṃgho /
V05bhivin_u:451_14: iyam itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī / tasyāḥ saṃghena utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:451_16: yasyā āryamiśrikānāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosāryamāṇāṃ saṃghena sā tūṣṇīm asya yasyā na kṣamati sā bhāṣetu /
V05bhivin_u:451_17: iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā / evaṃ traivācikaṃ pratyosāritā āryamiśrikā iyam itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:451_19: kṣamati taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:452_0: atha sā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ceti na kācit pratikṣipati /
V05bhivin_u:452_2: kin tāvad iman ti / aparā āhuḥ / vayam api na jānīmaḥ / etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:452_4: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha kāliṃ / yāvad etam evārthaṃ pṛcchitā /
V05bhivin_u:452_5: āha / ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptām apratikṛtāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:452_7: tena hi na kṣamati / peyālaṃ / atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:453_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ apratikṛtāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:453_2: svayam eva pratyosārayati / ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko /
V05bhivin_u:454_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti upasampannā yāvad ubhayataḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:454_1: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantīti / svayam vā jāne parato vā śrutvā /
V05bhivin_u:454_3: dharmato vinayato ti / sati āpatyā adarśanena / apratidharmeṇa / trayāṇāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ apratinissargāya /
V05bhivin_u:454_6: akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ ti prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇīyo asaṃjñāpayitvā /
V05bhivin_u:455_1: saṃghamadhye avalokanām akṛtvā svayam eva pratyosārayet /
V05bhivin_u:456_0: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:456_1: apratikṛtāṃ / akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ / anavalokayitvā bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati /
V05bhivin_u:457_0: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣiptā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:457_1: yā tasyā upādhyāyī vā ācāryāyiṇī vā ca yā prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇyāḥ tā saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:459_0: evaṃ tayā ajñānatayā kṛtaṃ / na punar evaṃ kariṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:460_2: iyam itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī / tasyāḥ saṃghena amukasmin vastuni utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:460_3: sā vartaṃ vartayati / lomaṃ pātayati / niḥsaraṇaṃ pravartayati / yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgham itthannāmā pratyosāraṇāṃ yāceya /
V05bhivin_u:460_6: evam etaṃ dhārayāmi / tāya yācayitavyaṃ / peyālaṃ / atha tatra kācit pṛatihati karmakriyamāṇe prakṛtisthābhir bhikṣuṇībhiḥ saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:461_0: bhikṣur api jānan bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati sthūlātyayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:462_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānanti bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ apratikṛtāṃ akṛtāṃ akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati /
V05bhivin_u:465_0: 165. bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati / tatra jetā nāma bhikṣuṇī / tām aparaḥ puruṣo raktacittaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:465_2: so āha / jānāsi ārye kasya vayam arthāya āryāya dadāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:465_3: sā āha / jānāmi / so āha / kasyārthāya / sā āha / puṇyaṃ te bhaviṣyati so āha /
V05bhivin_u:465_5: ayaṃ tv aham āryāya arthikaḥ āryāya dadāmi /
V05bhivin_u:465_6: sā tāvad vigatarāgā / naiva pratikṣipati / nādhivāsayati / etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahaprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:465_8: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha jetāṃ / sā śabdāpitā / etad evaṃ sarvaṃ pṛcchīyati /
V05bhivin_u:465_9: yāvad ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te jete / nanu te paścimā nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:466_0: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:467_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī anavaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pratigṛhṇīyāt pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā bhakṣyaṃ vā bhojyaṃ vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā ayam api dharmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:468_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yāvad upasampannā ubhayataḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:468_4: pātram iti jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyamaṃ kanyasam vā /
V05bhivin_u:468_6: khādyam iti khādanīyaṃ / bhojyam iti bhojanīyaṃ / antaśaḥ glānabhaiṣajyam iti saptāhikaṃ vā yāvajjīvikam vā /
V05bhivin_u:468_7: ayam api dharma / yāvat prajñaptiḥ / eṣo tāvan manuṣyo bhikṣuṇīya dadāti pātram vā cīvaram /
V05bhivin_u:468_8: bhakṣyabhojyam vā / glānabhaiṣajyam vā / tāṃ puruṣo āha / āryāya vayam arthikā / āryāya vayam dadāma iti / na kṣamati pratīcchituṃ / sa vaktavyaḥ / tavaiva bhavatu dīrghāyuḥ labhiṣyāmaḥ vayam anyato pi /
V05bhivin_u:468_10: atha vācaṃ na bhāṣati hastavikāraṃ vā pādavikāraṃ vā akṣivikāraṃ vā karoti /
V05bhivin_u:468_11: haṣtam vā prasphoṭayati / aṅgulīṃ vā akṣiṃ vā nipātayati /
V05bhivin_u:469_0: atha khalu denaṃ deti prasannair indriyaiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:469_1: atha khalu tayā bhikṣuṇyā āśayena pratīcchitavyaṃ pratīcchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:470_0: evaṃ bhikṣor api raktacittā strī dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:470_2: nimittaṃ karoti / jānāti raktacittā iti / naṃ pratīcchati vinayātikraman āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:471_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātram cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyam vā pratigṛhṇeya ayam api dharmo prathamāpattiko /
V05bhivin_u:473_0: 166. bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati / bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:473_1: na kṣamati avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātraṃ vā yāvat pratigṛhṇātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:473_2: sā jetā tasya puruṣasya na praticchati /
V05bhivin_u:473_3: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī āha / pratigṛhṇa tvam ārye etasya puruṣasya /
V05bhivin_u:473_4: kiṃ te paro kariṣyati / avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā / yato ca tvam anavaśrutā / dāyakadānapatīnāṃ sakāśāt pratigṛhṇītvā yathāpratyayaṃ karohi /
V05bhivin_u:473_5: sā bhikṣuṇībhir ucyate / mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vada /
V05bhivin_u:473_7: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
V05bhivin_u:473_8: yato ca tvam anavaśrutā / dāyakadānapatīnāṃ sakāśāt pratigṛhṇītvā yathāpratyayaṃ karohi /
V05bhivin_u:473_10: dvitīyam tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:473_11: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:473_13: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha nandāṃ yāvad ām bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:473_14: bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te nande / naiṣa dharmo naiṣa vinayaḥ / atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:474_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ evaṃ vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:474_2: kiṃ te paraḥ kariṣyati / avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā / yā tvam anavaśrutā / dāyakadānapatīnāṃ sakāśāt pratigṛhṇītvā yathāpratyayaṃ karohi /
V05bhivin_u:474_3: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā etad eva vastuṃ pratigṛhya tiṣtheya na pratinissaret /
V05bhivin_u:474_4: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:474_5: no ca pratiniḥsareya / ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyakaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:475_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:475_1: tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm iti yathā tāṃ jetāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:475_2: bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vadet / sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:475_3: peyālaṃ / evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tad evaṃ vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:475_4: ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyakaḥ yathā bhikṣuvinaye /
V05bhivin_u:476_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:476_2: kiṃ te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
V05bhivin_u:476_3: yā tvam anavaśrutā / dāyakadānapatīnāṃ deyadharmaṃ pratigṛhṇītvā yathāpratyayaṃ karohi /
V05bhivin_u:476_4: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:476_5: mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vade /
V05bhivin_u:476_7: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
V05bhivin_u:476_8: yā tvam anavaśrutā / dāyakadānapatīnāṃ deyadharmaṃ paritigṛhṇitvā yathāpratyayaṃ karohi /
V05bhivin_u:476_9: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:476_10: na pratiniḥsareya / sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanuśāsitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:476_11: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā samanubhāṣyamāṇā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:476_12: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:478_0: 167. bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati / dvau bhedena tathaiva kartavyo yāvat tena bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:479_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedanasamvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:479_1: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:479_2: mā ārye samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya /
V05bhivin_u:479_3: bhedanasamvartanīyam vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
V05bhivin_u:479_4: sametu āryā saṃghena / samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodayamāna avivadamāno /
V05bhivin_u:479_5: ek'uddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ sukhañ ca phāsuñ ca viharati /
V05bhivin_u:479_6: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:479_7: na pratiniḥsareya / sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:479_8: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsareya /
V05bhivin_u:482_0: tasyāḥ khalu bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣuṇyo bhavanti sahāyikā /
V05bhivin_u:482_1: ekā vā dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā /
V05bhivin_u:482_4: mā āryamiśrikāḥ etāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ kiñcid avavadittha /
V05bhivin_u:482_5: kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā / dharmavādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī vinayavādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:482_6: asmākaṃ caiṣā bhikṣuṇī chandañ ca ruciṃ ca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati /
V05bhivin_u:482_7: yañ caitasyāḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca /
V05bhivin_u:482_8: jānantī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī bhāṣate no ajānanti /
V05bhivin_u:482_9: tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:482_15: samagro hi saṃgho / sahito sammodayamāno avivadamāno ek'uddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:482_17: evañ ca tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:482_18: no ce pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:482_19: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:482_20: no ca pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ / tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:484_1: tatra sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī adhikaraṇāny utpādayati /
V05bhivin_u:484_3: sā saṃghaṃ ākrośati saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:484_4: chandagāmī cāryā saṃgho / doṣagāmī cāryā saṃgho / bhayagāmī cāryā saṃgho / mohagāmī cāryā saṃgho / chandan niśrāya / doṣan niśrāya / mohan niśrāya mama ākroṣitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:484_6: mā ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpaya /
V05bhivin_u:484_7: na saṃgho chandagāmī / peyālaṃ / yāvan na mohan niśrāya yāvad āryā evaṃ chandagāmī /
V05bhivin_u:484_8: mā ārye chandan niśrāya saṃgham ākroṣitavyam manyasi paribhāṣitavyam manyasi /
V05bhivin_u:484_9: sā tvam evam ucyamānī na pratikramasi dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam adhyucyamāni na pratikramasi /
V05bhivin_u:484_11: tena hi gacchatha / triṣkṛtvā kuvege / triṣkṛtvā mahājane / tṛṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye samanugrāhatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:484_12: sā kuvege ucyate / satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:484_13: alam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:484_14: yāvat khalu te ārye mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣiṇīya karoti /
V05bhivin_u:484_16: dve vāce avaśiṣṭe / pratiniḥsara na pratinissarāmīty āha /
V05bhivin_u:484_18: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:484_19: peyālaṃ / yāva āmo ty āha / sā tāva saṃghamadhye pi vaktavyā peyālaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:484_21: anubhāṣṭā bhagavan āryā nandā triṣkṛtvā kuvege triṣkṛtvā mahājane triṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye etasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:484_22: na pratiniḥsarati / bhagavān āha śabdāpayatha nandāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:484_23: peyālaṃ / yāvad evaṃ caivañ ca pṛṣṭā / peyālaṃ / ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te nande / nanv ahaṃ nande anekaparyāyeṇa daurvacasyaṃ vigarhāmi yāvan naivaṃ kurvato vṛddhir bhavati kūśaleṣu dharmeṣu atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:485_1: sā evam āha / chandagāmī ca saṃgho / doṣagāmī ca / bhayagāmī ca / mohagāmī ca / saṃgho chandan niśrāya / doṣan niśrāya / bhayan niśrāya / mohan niśrāya / samākrośitavyaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ manyati /
V05bhivin_u:485_2: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:485_3: mā ārye evaṃ vada / na saṃgho chandagāmī / na saṃgho doṣagāmī / na saṃgho bhayagāmī / na saṃgho mohagāmī / na ca saṃgho chandan niśrāya /
V05bhivin_u:485_5: paribhāṣitavyaṃ manyati / ārye ca chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohan niśrāya saṃgham ākrośitavyaṃ manyati /
V05bhivin_u:485_6: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamāna tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:485_7: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇībhiḥ yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V05bhivin_u:485_8: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamānā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etat kuślaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:485_9: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ / ayam api dharmo yāvattṛtīyakaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:486_0: yāvad eṣā bhikṣuṇī triṣkṛtvā kuvege samanugrāhiyamānā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati /
V05bhivin_u:486_2: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:486_5: evam dvitīyātṛtīyām vā vācāyāṃ yāvad vyavaropitāyāṃ saṃghātiśeṣaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:487_0: ye ca kuvege / ye ca mahājane / ye ca saṃghamadhye vinayātikaramāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:487_1: sthūlātyayāḥ sarve te pratiprasrabhyanti sthāpayitvā aṣṭau sthūlātyayāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:487_4: kathaṃ tāvat pratiniḥ sargārhaṃ katham apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:487_5: abhūṣi me saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpayāmi prāpayiṣyāmi ceti evaṃ pratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:487_6: kathaṃ pratiniḥsargārhaṃ / abhūṣi me saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpitañ ca /
V05bhivin_u:487_7: na khalv idānīṃ prāpayāmi na ca prāpayiṣyāmīty apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:488_1: sā evam āha / chandagāmī / cāryamiśrikāyo / saṃgho doṣagāmī ca bhayagāmī ca saṃgho /
V05bhivin_u:488_2: mohagāmī ca saṃgho / chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya samākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:488_3: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:488_5: na saṃgho chandagāmī / na saṃgho doṣagāmī / na saṃgho bhayagāmī / na saṃgho mohagāmī / na ca saṃgho chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya āryām ākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:488_6: āryā evaṃ chandagāminī doṣagāminī bhayagāminī mohagāminī /
V05bhivin_u:488_7: āryā eva chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohan niśrāya saṃegham ākrośitavyaṃ roṣitavyaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ manyati /
V05bhivin_u:488_8: viramārya saṃghākrośanāto / evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam evi vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhet /
V05bhivin_u:488_9: na partiniḥsareya / sā bhikṣuṇ bhikṣunībhir yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:488_11: taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:488_12: no cet pratiniḥsareya / ayam api dharmo yāvattṛtīyako /
V05bhivin_u:490_1: chandakamātā nāma bhikṣuṇī / sā uddeśaparyavasānehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā /
V05bhivin_u:490_2: peyālaṃ / yathaiva chandakasya tathaivaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:491_1: sā uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti /
V05bhivin_u:491_2: sā evam āha / mā me āryamiśrikāyo kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇam vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V05bhivin_u:491_3: aham apy āryamiśrikāṇān na kiñcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇam vā pāpakam vā /
V05bhivin_u:491_5: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:491_6: mā ārye uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karohi /
V05bhivin_u:491_8: āryā pi bhikṣuṇīyo vadantu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
V05bhivin_u:491_9: āryam api bhikṣuṇīyo vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
V05bhivin_u:491_10: evaṃ saṃvṛddhā khalu punar ārye tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanyavacanīyā anyamanyāpattivyutthāpanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:491_11: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:491_12: na pratiniḥsareya / sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:491_13: yāvāttṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇa vā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:491_14: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:493_1: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māsorakadhītā kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā hi viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:493_5: kinti dāni kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:493_6: peyālaṃ / kin ti dāni anyamanyasyāvadyāni praticchādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:493_10: māryamiśrikāyo kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā viharatha mā vācikena mā kāyikavācikena /
V05bhivin_u:493_13: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramanti /
V05bhivin_u:493_14: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tā bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:494_0: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu punar dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:494_2: tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:494_5: nānā vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:494_6: na parihāṇiḥ / evaṃ ca tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:494_7: ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ / no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V05bhivin_u:494_8: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ itya etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:494_9: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tam evam vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:495_0: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā /
V05bhivin_u:495_3: tā bhikṣuṇīyo yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā /
V05bhivin_u:495_5: evaṃ syur vacanīyā / mā āryamiśrikāyo saṃsṛṣṭā viharatha /
V05bhivin_u:495_7: peyālaṃ / yāvat tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:495_8: yaṃ taṃ vastuṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti anyamanyasyāvadyāni praticchādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:495_9: tā bhikṣuṇīyo ti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhitā /
V05bhivin_u:495_10: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:495_11: trikkhutto kuvege trikkhutto mahājane trikkhutto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:495_12: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:495_13: no ca pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyako saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:495_14: peyālaṃ / yāvat prajñaptiḥ / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastun na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:495_15: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:495_17: vyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayaṃ / evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vācāyām adhyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:495_20: kim apratiniḥsargārhaṃ / abhūṣi khalu mo saṃsṛṣṭā vihariṣyāmo /
V05bhivin_u:495_22: no ca khalu vihṛtaṃ / evaṃ pratiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:495_24: abhūṣi khalu mo saṃsṛṣṭā vihariṣyāmo anyonyasyāvadyapraticchādikā ti te dānīm viharāmo vihariṣyāmo na vihṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:496_0: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭāyo viharanti anyonyasyāvadyapraticchādikā / peyālaṃ / vistareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:499_1: bhagavān āha / śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ / na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi saṃsṛṣṭā viharitun ti /
V05bhivin_u:499_2: nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:499_6: tāsāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:499_7: na parihāniḥ / kiṃ yūyam eva evaṃrūpā saṃghe /
V05bhivin_u:499_9: na ca saṃgho tāsāṃ kiñcid āha /
V05bhivin_u:499_10: yuṣmān eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhavena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /

V05bhivin_u:525_10: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha nandāṃ / sā dāni śabdāpitā / bhagavān āha / satyaṃ tvaṃ nande śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:525_11: āha / ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te nande / peyālam / tena hi na kṣamati / śayyāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā anyañ cetāpayitvā /
V05bhivin_u:525_12: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:526_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyam vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:527_1: śayyāsanasyārthāyeti / śayyāsanaṃ nāma mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ bisi caturasraṃ kuccaṃ bimbohanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:527_4: pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:528_0: nissargikapācattikaṃ ti saṃghe nissariya pācatikaṃ deśayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:529_1: vastu pradarśayitavyaṃ / imaṃ mayā amukāto mañcamūlyaṃ labdhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:529_3: yāvad bimboyadhānasya / tam vastuṃ na darśeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:529_4: khaṇḍaṃ pralugnaṃ vā vā lepanikām vā kartuṃ kumbhiyo upasthāpayituṃ bhikṣur api śayanāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:529_5: vastun darśetvā labhyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pralugnādi kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:530_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyaṃ vā cetāpaye niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:532_1: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī omalinamalinehi cīvarehi pāṭitavipāṭitehi khaṇḍena pātreṇa chidravichidreṇa piṇḍapātam aṇvati /
V05bhivin_u:532_2: striyo āhaṃsuḥ / nāsty āryāye pātraṃ / āha / nāsti / āha / ahan te ārye pātrasya mūlyaṃ demi /
V05bhivin_u:532_3: pātram ārye jānāpetu / aparā āha / nāsty āryāye cīvaraṃ / āha nāsti / āha / aham āryāye cīvarasya mūlyaṃ demi /
V05bhivin_u:532_4: cīvaram āryā jānāpayitu / sā khādati ca pibati ca naiva pātraṃ na cīvaraṃ jānāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:532_6: tā dāni striyo āhaṃsuḥ / mayā āryāye nandāye pātrasya mūlyan dattaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:532_8: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo āhaṃsuḥ / kiṃ sā bhadrāyaṇī jānāpayiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:532_9: sā khādati ca pibati ca / etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:532_11: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha nandāṃ / sā dāni śabdāpitā / satyaṃ nande evan nāma tvaṃ nande anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:532_12: āha / āma bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvad evaṃ nāma tvam anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:532_13: tena hi na kṣamati anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:532_14: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:533_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:534_2: anyaṃ cetāpayed iti bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:534_3: yāvat prajñaptiḥ / eṣo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kācit pātram vā cīvaram vā ghṛtam vā tailam vā cetāpayituṃ mūlyan deti /
V05bhivin_u:534_6: anyaṃ cetāpayati / niḥsargikapācatikaṃ / atha aniyataṃ deti yaṃ icchati taṃ jānāpeti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:534_7: atha dān āha / yam icchasi taṃ gṛhṇāhīti / yam icchati taṃ jānāpeti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:534_8: bhikṣavor apy evam eva āpattis tu vinayātikaramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:534_9: avivakṣite anāpattiḥ / yam vā icchasi taṃ gṛhṇāhīti taṃ gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:535_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśakenānyaṃ cetāpayati niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:537_1: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktakāni samādāyeti /
V05bhivin_u:537_2: sā chandakam aṇvantī āha / prajāpati detha chandakaṃ / āryamiśrikāṇāṃ bhaktaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:537_3: tā dāni striyo chandakaṃ prajantīntīyo jalpanti /
V05bhivin_u:537_6: atha sā khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:537_7: tāya khāditāvaśeṣeṇa yādṛśaṃ vā bhaktaṃ kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:537_9: āhaṃsuḥ / ārye asmābhir bahuko chandako dinno /
V05bhivin_u:537_11: bhikṣuṇīyo āhaṃsuḥ / kim eṣā bhadrāyaṇī taṃ kariṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:537_12: khādati caiṣā pibati ca / pātraṃ cīvaraṃ caiṣā jānāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:537_14: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:537_16: bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha nandāṃ / sā dāni śabdāpitā / satyaṃ nande evannāma tvam anyeṣām arthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:537_17: ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te nande / atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajapatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:537_18: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:538_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān vā cetāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:539_1: anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā saṃghasya bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgūpānasya vā yācitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:539_2: atha khalu yasyārthāya yācati tam eva jānāpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:539_3: atha dāni vastraṃ vipraṇāmeti bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgūpānasya vā arthāya yācayitvā vaibhaṅgikaṃ dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:539_4: śayyāsanam vā upasthāpeti vārṣikam vā hemantikam vā deti /
V05bhivin_u:539_5: vinayātikramam āsādayati / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktaṃ dāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:539_7: yadi tahiṃ kiñcic cheṣaṃ bhavati odanam vā sūpam vā yāvad bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā upadarśayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:539_9: atha dān āha / āryāya demīti / vaktavyaṃ / na hi / saṃghasya dehi / athāha dinnaṃ mayā saṃghasya /
V05bhivin_u:539_10: āryāya demītī / pratīcchati / anāpattiḥ / bhikṣor api evam eva āpattis tu vinyātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:540_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajya pariṣkārān vā cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:543_1: bhikṣuṇīyo āgantukā āgatāḥ / tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo yathāvṛddhikāya utthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:543_2: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāva pātrāṇi saṃkrāmayemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:543_3: tāyo dāni anastamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:543_5: āgantukā āhaṃsuḥ / ārye rikto vihārako / āhaṃsuḥ yāvat pātrāṇi saṃkrāmayemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:543_6: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ / kiyanty āryamiśrikāṇāṃ pātrāṇi /
V05bhivin_u:543_8: kā vā jātiḥ / etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:543_11: tā dāni śabdāpitāḥ / satyaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo ti / bhagavāṃs tad eva sarvaṃ pṛcchīyati /
V05bhivin_u:543_12: yāvad ām bhagavan / bhagavān āha / evañ ca nāma yūyaṃ pātrasannicayaṃ karotha /
V05bhivin_u:543_13: tena hi na kṣamati pātrasannicayaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:543_14: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:543_15: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:544_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātrasannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:545_1: pātrasannicayan ti pātran nāma sumbhakaṃ upasambhakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:545_5: sannicayaṃ kuryād iti saṃgrahaṃ kuryān nissargikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:546_3: catvāri apātrāṇi / catvāri atipātrāṇī / catvāri pariṣkārapātrāṇi / tad uttariṃ upasthāpayanti niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:546_4: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhaṃ pātradhāraṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:546_5: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bahukāny api pātrāṇi vikalpetvā paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:547_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātrasannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargikapācattikaṃ
V05bhivin_u:549_2: bhikṣuṇīyo āgantukāḥ āgatā / tā bhikṣuṇīyo yathāvṛddhikāya upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:549_3: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāvac cīvarāṇi saṃkrāmemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:549_4: tāyo dāni anastamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:549_6: āgantukāyo āhaṃsuḥ / ārye rikto vihārako / āhaṃsuḥ / yāvac cīvarānī saṃkrāmemaḥ / tā dān āhaṃsuḥ / kiyanty āryamiśrikāṇāṃ cīvarāṇi /
V05bhivin_u:549_8: kā vā jātiḥ / etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:551_4: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhañ cīvaradhāraṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:551_5: kiñcāpi bhikṣu bahukāni cīvarāṇi mitrāṇāṃ vikalpayitvā paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:554_1: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī cīvarāṇi naiva dhovati na sīveti na rañjeti /
V05bhivin_u:554_3: upāśraye nikṣiptā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti /
V05bhivin_u:554_5: sā bhikṣuṇīhi vuccati / ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhoviya sīviya phoṣiya prāvṛtā /
V05bhivin_u:554_6: sā dāni sthūlanandā āha / ānehi ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ mahyaṃ eṣā saṃghāṭī /
V05bhivin_u:554_7: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo na kiñcic chakyate upāśraye nikṣipituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:554_9: dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca sā dāni tāya saṃghāṭī ācchinnā /
V05bhivin_u:554_10: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:555_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇyupāśraye purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti /
V05bhivin_u:555_1: uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādiyeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:556_2: saṃghāṭīti cīvaraṃ / nikṣipetvā ti svayaṃ / nikṣipāyetvā ti pareṇa / yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti paścāt svayam eva upādīyeta niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:556_3: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīupāśraye cīvaraṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti yadi kāci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:556_5: atha dāni na kāyaci upādinnam bhavati tasyā eva ca tāya artho bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:556_6: atha dāni kṣudrānukṣudrakaṃ pariṣkāraṃ nikṣiptam bhavati yadi kāyaci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:556_8: bhikṣur api bhikṣuvihāre pātram vā cīvaram vā upānaham vā kṣudrānukṣudrakam vā pariṣkāraṃ nikṣipitvā yo icchati so upādīyatū ti /
V05bhivin_u:556_9: yadi kenacid upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchincituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:556_11: atha na kenacid gṛhītam bhavati so eva tenārthiko bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:557_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇy upāśraye purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādīyeya niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:559_1: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya purāṇasaṃghāṭī omalinamalinā dhovitvā niḥsīvitvā ātape dattvā vāto ca pravāpito /
V05bhivin_u:559_2: agniś ca utthitaḥ / saṃghāṭī dagdhā / etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:559_3: peyālaṃ yāvad bhagavān āha / evan nāma tvaṃ purāṇasaṃghāṭīṃ niḥsīvitvā na pratisaṃdhaisi na pratisandhāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:560_0: eṣā cārthotpattiḥ / tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo lecchavi kanyāyo sukumārāyo bhārikāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhovantīyo kilamyanti /
V05bhivin_u:560_1: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:560_3: yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi anujānāmi ṣaṭpañcarātraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:560_4: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīm gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:561_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ niḥsīvitvā niḥsivāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭpañcarātram agilānā na pratisandhāye na pratisandhāpayena niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:562_2: saṃghāṭīti dvipuṭā / niḥsīvitvā ti svayaṃ / niḥsīvāpetvā ti pareṇa / uttarīti ṣaṭpañcarātram iti na dāni ṣaṭpañca ca /
V05bhivin_u:562_3: atha khalu paramaṃ ṣaṭrātran na pratisandheyaiti svayaṃ na pratisandhāpeyā ti pareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:563_0: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye saṃghāṭī malinā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:563_1: yadi tāva lahukā bhoti tathā yeva dhovitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:563_2: na kṣamati niḥsīvayituṃ / atha dāni sārikā bhoti niḥsīvetvā niḥsīvitvā dhovitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:563_4: sāharitvā gopiṭake vā kuṇḍake vā paṭalake vā sthāpayitvā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍena vā upalakhaṇḍena vā ākramitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:563_6: atha dāni bhājanan na bhavati ekasthāne ākramiya iṣṭakena vā upalakhaṇḍena vā sthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:563_7: paścād antevāsiṇīya vā samānopādhyāyinīyā vā bhikṣuṇīya pratisandhāpayitavyā svayam vā pratisandhetavyā /
V05bhivin_u:563_8: atha dāni jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati kiñcāpi cireṇa pratisandheti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:564_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇasaṃghāṭīn niḥsīvitvā vā niḥsīvāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭpañcarātraṃ aglānā na pratisandhe vā na pratisandhāpeya vā niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:567_4: sā āha / yadi cīvaram desi tato ham upasampādemi /
V05bhivin_u:567_6: sā dān āha / ārye upasampādaya māṃ / sā vilakṣeti / sā bhikṣuṇīnām āha / evam eva yāva sā vilakṣeti nopasampādeti /
V05bhivin_u:567_7: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:568_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evam uktvā yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyāmīti tāye cīvaraṃ gṛhya nopasampādayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:569_1: śikṣamāṇā ti deśitaśikṣā / yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:569_2: cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma kambalaṃ karpāsaṃ yāvat saṃkakṣikā /
V05bhivin_u:569_4: sā taṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇitvā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī na upasampādayed iti svayan na upasampādayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:569_5: yāvat prajñaptiḥ / eṣā tāva bhikṣuṇī śikṣyamāṇāyā cīvaraṃ gṛhṇāti /
V05bhivin_u:569_7: tāya upasaṃsthāpayitavyā / atha dāni apratibalā bhavati jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā vā anyā adhyeṣitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:569_8: vaktavyā etasyā mayā cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā imām upasthāpehi /
V05bhivin_u:569_9: atha sā necchati taṃ cīvaraṃ pratidātavyaṃ /

V05bhivin_u:1051_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pātāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpayed vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1052_3: gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyan ti bhikṣuṇī vaktavyo śastrakarma kārāpayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:1053_0: anavalokayitvā saṃghā ti saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā /
V05bhivin_u:1053_1: śṛṇotu me āryā saṃgho yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī śastrakarma kārāpeya /
V05bhivin_u:1053_2: kārāpayiṣyati āryā saṃgho itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī śastrakarma /
V05bhivin_u:1053_3: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:1054_0: puruṣeṇeti gṛhasthena vā pravrajitena vā pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpeya vā ti yathā jetā bhikṣuṇīti pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1054_1: atha dāni saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati antevāsinīye vā samānopādhyāyinīye vā samānācāryāye vā yasyā viśvāso tāya ākhyātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1054_2: kaṇṭakena vā nakhena vā bhedāpayitavyaṃ bhaiṣajyena vā ālimpāpeyatavyaṃ atha dāni adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām bhavati gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayati vā dhovāpayati vā upanāhāpayati vā evam śirām vā vedhāpayati nelāṭikam vā bāhuśirām vā gulphaśirām vā aparāya bhikṣuṇīya ākramitavyā tena bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:1055_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpayed vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1058_1: atha kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā sāṃghikaṃ vihāraṃ bandhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1058_2: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1058_3: pe / yāvad āma bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duṣkṛtam te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ varṣopagatānāṃ cārikāṃ prakramasi /
V05bhivin_u:1058_4: tena hi na kṣamati varṣopagatāya cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1058_5: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:1059_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1060_1: varṣā ti varṣārātraṃ / upagatā ti purimikāṃ paścimikām vā varṣopanāmayikāṃ upagatā /
V05bhivin_u:1060_2: cārikāṃ prakrāmeyā ti anyatra gaccheya grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1060_3: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ekarātram pi vipravasati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1060_4: atha dāni rājabhayam vā senābhayam vā paracakrabhayam vā jīvitāntarāyo vā brahmacaryāntarāyo vā bhaveya kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1060_5: nāsti bhikṣuṇyā avalokanākarma saptāhaṃ vā kiñcāpi bhikuḥ avalokanākarma kṛtvā saptāhaṃ vā adhiṣṭhiheya gacchaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1061_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ //3 //
V05bhivin_u:1064_1: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni śrāvastīyaṃ varṣoṣitāḥ vaiśālīm āgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1064_3: tā striyo āhaṃsuḥ / kahiṃ āryamiśrikā varṣoṣitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1064_4: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ / śrāvastīyaṃ / āhaṃsuḥ / kīdṛśī śrāvastī / āhaṃsuḥ / idṛśī ca idṛśī ca evam ārāmaramaṇīyā /
V05bhivin_u:1064_5: evaṃ / jetavanaṃ / evaṃ gandhakuṭī / evam bhagavān viharati / evam āryamiśrikā śāriputramaudgalyāyanāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1064_6: yadi pravrajyā eṣā pravrajyā iyaṃ punar asmākam āryadhītā ihaiva jātā /
V05bhivin_u:1064_7: ihaiva samvṛddhā / naiva kahiñci gacchati kūpamaṇḍūka iva tiṣṭhati aniḥkramā /
V05bhivin_u:1064_8: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1064_9: yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi varṣāvustāyā bhikṣuṇīya cārikā prakramitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:1065_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1066_1: varṣoṣiteti vārṣikāṃ trayo māsān cārikāṃ na prakrameyā ti antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1066_2: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī evaṃ rātraṃ pi prakramati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1066_3: atha dāni jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti na pratibalā gantuṃ kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1066_4: bhikṣur api varṣāvusto cārikāṃ na prakramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1067_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ // ṇka //
V05bhivin_u:1070_1: sthūlanandāya bhikṣuṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī rājagṛhaṃ gacchamānī nivāritā /
V05bhivin_u:1070_2: ihāryāya varṣā vasitavyā tāya sā kulehi samvarṇitā /
V05bhivin_u:1070_3: āryā jetā bhadrikā guṇavatī anubaddhā tā saṃvṛtā ca /
V05bhivin_u:1070_4: etāya adhikāraṃ karotha sā dāni kulāni upasaṃkramati prāsādikena atikrāntena pratikrāntena avalokitena vyavalokitena sammiñjitaprasāritena saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇena anubaddhā anunnaḍā acapalā amukharā aprakīrṇavācā /
V05bhivin_u:1070_6: te taṃhi kārāṃ kurvanti / pratyālapanti pratyutthihenti nimantrayanti pātreṇa cīvareṇa glānapratyayabhaiṣajya pariṣkārehi /
V05bhivin_u:1070_7: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇi anākalpasaṃpannā anīryāpathasampannā omalinamalinehi cīvarehi pāṭitavipāṭitehi vaḍḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭālaṃbehi stanehi vaḍḍhehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā capalā mukharā prakīrṇavācā /
V05bhivin_u:1070_8: te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti /
V05bhivin_u:1070_9: sā dāni tāṃ udvahati kāyena vācā /
V05bhivin_u:1070_10: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1070_11: yāvad bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha nandāṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā tad eva sarvaṃ pṛcchīyatīti yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:1070_12: bhagavān āha duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:1071_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evam uktvā ihārye varṣaṃ vasitavyaṃ ity uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1072_1: bhikṣuṇīm evam vade ihārye varṣāṃ vasitavyam iti trayo māsāṃ uktveti nivārayitvā paścād udvaheya vā ti kāyena vā vācā vā svayaṃ udvahati /
V05bhivin_u:1072_2: udvāhāpeya vā ti pareṇa kāyena vā vācāya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1072_3: yāvat prajñaptiḥ / na kṣamati nivārayitvā paścād udvahituṃ atha bhavati śithilikā vā bāhulikā vā aśikṣākāmā vā kalahakārikā vā paśyati yadīha vaśiṣyati āśrayam utpādayiṣyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:1072_4: kiñcāpi udvahati anāpattiḥ / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm udvahati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1072_5: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇāṃ vā udvahati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1072_6: antamasato gṛhiṇī pi udvahati samvaragāmīvinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1073_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yevam vaditvā ihārye varṣam vasitavyan ti uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1076_1: atha kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī / sā upagacchati / tā kālaṃ grāmāntaraṃ gatā / sā bhikṣuṇīhi upagatāhi āgatā /
V05bhivin_u:1076_2: tatra ca bhikṣuṇīhi vihāroddeśaḥ śayanāsanoddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1076_3: sā dān āha / ārye mahyaṃ vihāraṃ detha / sā vihāraṃ na labhati / āhaṃsuḥ / kahiṃ āryā varṣopanāyikā kālaṅ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:1076_4: sā kalahaṃ karoti / aparā dāni bhikṣuṇī yogācārā /
V05bhivin_u:1076_5: sā dān āha / ārye ayaṃ mama vihāro / atra mañcakaṃ praveśehi sahitikā vasiṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1076_7: sā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍā ti yatra śākhāni praveśayati /
V05bhivin_u:1076_8: sā dān āha / ārye mā vihāre ovilayaṃ karehi /
V05bhivin_u:1076_9: sā dān āha / bhadrāyaṇi kin tvayā vihāro kṛto kim vikrīto /
V05bhivin_u:1076_10: sāṃghiko vihāro kim arthaṃ na praveśayiṣyam /
V05bhivin_u:1076_12: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1076_13: yāvat śabdāpayatha kāliṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā /
V05bhivin_u:1077_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācāya vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1078_1: jānantīti svayaṃ vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:1078_4: udvaheya vā ti svayaṃ / udvahāpeya / vā ti pareṇa kāyeṇa vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1078_6: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇām vā udvahati deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1079_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1082_0: 249. bhagavān kāśiṣu viharati / aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya uccāramallakaṃ apratyavekṣitvā rathyāyāṃ choritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1082_1: tahiṃ dāni aparo brāhmaṇo śīrṣasnāto āhatavastranivastro tāya rathyāya atikramati /
V05bhivin_u:1082_4: janena copahāsitaṃ brāhmaṇa susnātaḥ suviliptas tvam iti /
V05bhivin_u:1082_5: so dāni tām ākrośati / āha / itikitikāya dhīte śramaṇike na paśyasi mama śīrṣaṃ vastrāṇi ca viṣṭhena vināśitāni /
V05bhivin_u:1082_6: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1082_7: pe / yāvad āma bhagavan / bhagavān āha / duskṛtan te evan nāma tvam apratyavekṣiya choresi /
V05bhivin_u:1082_8: tena hi na kṣamati apratyavekṣiya chorayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1082_9: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:1083_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirokuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prāsrāvam vā kheṭakam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā apratyavekṣitvā chorayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1084_1: tirokuḍyan ti tiraḥprakāram uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā vastradhovanam vā bhāṇḍadhovanam vā keśān vā nakhān vā /
V05bhivin_u:1084_3: choreyā ti ujjheya / pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1084_5: yadi tāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā rathyā bhavanti ārāmayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1084_6: atha dāni anākīrṇā bhavanti kiñcāpi chorayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1084_7: taṃ pi dāni na kṣamati aśabdakarṇikāye chorayituṃ api tu acchaṭikā dātavyā ukkāsitavyam vā /
V05bhivin_u:1084_8: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī naiva pratyavekṣati nāpi acchaṭikāṃ dattvā chorayati pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1084_9: bhikṣur api apratyavekṣya acchaṭikām akṛtvā chorayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1085_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirokuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā apratyavekṣya choreya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1088_2: rājño dāni prasenajitasya kośalasya pūrvakoṣṭhakaṃ nāma udyānam puṣkiriṇīsampannaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1088_3: anāvṛtaṃ bhikṣūnāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āvṛtaṃ itarāye janatāye /
V05bhivin_u:1088_4: rājā dāni ārāmikasyāha / ho bhaṇe ārāmika pūrvakoṣṭhakam udyānaṃ siktasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ karehi /
V05bhivin_u:1088_8: tāyo dāni pratikṛty eva gatvā tahiṃ haritaśādvalopastarāṇāyāṃ pakvakheṭena ca pakvasiṃghāṇakena ca vināśayitvā padumapatrehi uccārasya puṭakāni bandhitvā puṣkiriṇīyaṃ pravāhayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1088_9: tāyo dāni divasaṃ tahiṃ kākāvāhāṃ bhañjiya sāyāhnasamaye nagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ rājā dāni prasenajita kośalo aparejjukāto niragato sāntaḥpuro /
V05bhivin_u:1088_10: tāyo dāni antaḥpurikāyo kathañcid eva samrodhād avamuktā randhanamokṣam iva manyamānāḥ cañcūryante /
V05bhivin_u:1088_12: kāścid ito ca ito ca dhāvanti avakāśaṃ gṛhṇanti śādvalopastaraṇe paribhrāmanti /
V05bhivin_u:1088_13: tāsāṃ dāni pakvakheṭena pakvasiṃghāṇakena vastrāṇi vināśitāni /
V05bhivin_u:1088_14: puṣkiriṇīṃ otīrṇāḥ snānāya / tāyo paśyanti puṭakān plavamānān /
V05bhivin_u:1088_15: tāsāṃ bhavati kulaputrakehi śrutaṃ śvo rājā sāntaḥpuro udyānaṃ pravekṣyatīti tehi ete gandhapuṭakāḥ pravāhitā iti kṛtvā tāyo gṛhṇanti /
V05bhivin_u:1088_16: te udakena klinnā uccāreṇa cā khāditāḥ prakṛtisukumāraṃ ca padmapatraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1088_17: gṛhītamātram eva vilīnaṃ / hī hī viṣṭhaṃ tā dāni rājño upasaṃkrāntā āhaṃsu /
V05bhivin_u:1088_18: mahārāja eṣa tāvad īdṛśī avasthā rājā āha śabdāpayatha ārāmikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1088_19: so dāni śabdāpito / rājā āha / ho bhaṇe ārāmika kena udyānaṃ viṭṭālitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1088_20: āha ṣaḍvargiṇīyo śramaṇīyo eva divasaṃ kākavāhā bhañjitvā gatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1088_21: rājā hasitvā āha / tāsām avinītānāṃ karma bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:1088_22: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1089_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī harite tṛṇe uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:1090_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī udake uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:1091_1: uccāran ti gūthaṃ / prasrāvan ti mūtraṃ / kheṭam iti śleṣmā / siṃghāṇakan ti pakvasiṃghāṇakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1091_2: harite tṛṇe iti śādvale acchinnālūnasmiṃ udan ti udakāni nāma daśa /
V05bhivin_u:1091_3: nādikaṃ tāḍāgaṃ audupānikaṃ śvabhrodakaṃ praghārimaṃ vṛṣṭisthitaṃ ucchodakaṃ antarīkṣapānīyaṃ himavilīnaṃ sāmudram vā uccāram vā prasrāvaṃ vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1091_4: atha dāni prāvṛṣeṇyā se sarvabhumiḥ śādvalopastareṇā bhavati yahiṃ pradeśe svalpaharitam bhavati tahiṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1091_5: atha dāni alpaharitaṃ na bhavati kaṭāhake vā iṣṭakāyam vā upale vā śuṣkatṛṇe vā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍe vā yatra vā anyena uccāro kṛto bhavati balīvardena vā /
V05bhivin_u:1091_6: yatra vā anyena manuṣyena kṛto tahiṃ kartavyaṃ atha dāni evaṃ na bhavati antamasato kanīyasiṃ pi aṅguliṃ upadrāhayitvā kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1091_7: tathā kartavyaṃ yathā tahim prathamam nipatati /
