V05bhivin_u:1155_5: atha dāni paśyati durbhikṣa vā bhaveya piṇḍapāto vā na labhyeta jarādurbalā vā bhavati vyādhidurbalā vā gailānyam vā kiñcid bhaviṣyati alpalābho mātṛgrāmo mā vihanyeyā ti /
V05bhivin_u:1155_7: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī alaṅkāram aparityājayitvā pravrajeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1158_1: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākīyakanyāyo koliyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo mahākulehi pravrajitā ceṭikām ādāya pravrajanti /
V05bhivin_u:1158_2: tāyo ceṭikāyo prāsādikāyo darśanīyāyo veśyaṃ (!) vāhayanti /
V05bhivin_u:1158_3: jano dani ojjhāyati / neyaṃ pravrajyā gaṇikā imā / etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1158_4: yāvad āma bhagavan / bhagavān āha / evaṃ ca nāma yūyaṃ veśyām upasthāpayatha /
V05bhivin_u:1158_5: tena hi na kṣamati veśyām (!) upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1158_6: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī veśyām upasthāpayati tena jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1161_3: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mahākulehi pravrajanti /
V05bhivin_u:1161_5: tāyo dāni ārāmikinīyo prāsādikāyo jano dāni ojjhāyati /
V05bhivin_u:1161_7: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:1161_8: bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati paudagalikām ārāmikinīm upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1161_9: na kṣamati ārāmikinī / nā kṣamati ceṭī / na kṣamati kalpiyakārī / sā eṣā bhikṣūṇī yā paudgalikām ārāmikinīm upasthāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1164_2: tāye dāni pīnehi stanehi gacchantīya cīvaram utkṣipīyati /
V05bhivin_u:1164_5: peyālaṃ / yāvad āma bhagavan / bhagavān āha tena saṃkakṣikā nāma kartavyā /
V05bhivin_u:1164_6: samkakṣikāṃ prāvarantīya tathā prāvaritavyaṃ yathā dāni stanāpīḍitā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:1164_7: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃkakṣikān nopasthāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1164_8: santī na prāvarayati vinayātikramaḥ idam ucyate saṃkakṣikāpratisaṃyuktaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1167_2: yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati nagnikāyā snātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1167_3: dakaśāṭikāya snāpitavyaṃ / dakaśāṭikāpratisaṃyuktaṃ / na kṣamati nadīyam vā oghe vā puṣkiriṇīyam vā taḍāge vā nagnikāya snāpituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1167_5: atha dāni vihāre gupte pradeśe nagnikā snāyaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1171_4: so manuṣyo puno puno śabdaṃ śṛṇoti /
V05bhivin_u:1171_5: so dān āha / kim etan ti / sā dāni strī āha / bhavatu āryaputra aham etaṃ jānāmi kin tavānena jñānena /
V05bhivin_u:1171_6: āha / nahi ācikṣāhi / āha / etā āryamiśrikāyo brahmacāriṇīyo kāmarāgena khajjantīyo hastatalena āsphoṭayanti āṅgajātaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1171_9: yāvad bhagavān aha / tena hi na kṣamati talaghātakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1171_10: talaghātapratisaṃyuktaṃ / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī hastatalenāṅgajātam āsphoṭayati pātreṇa vā kupātreṇa vā kaṃsikāya vā viḍallāya vā anyena vā puna kenacit tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1174_1: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya kāmarāgeṇa khajjantīya jatumaṭṭhakaṃ mañcakaṃ yantritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1174_2: atra vipratipadyiṣyan ti / tad anantaram agnir utthito /
V05bhivin_u:1174_3: tāya dāni saṃbhrāntāya asamanvāharitvā sa mañcako bahin niṣkāsito /
V05bhivin_u:1174_5: kahiṃ agnir utthito kasya gṛhād utthito /
V05bhivin_u:1174_6: tehi dāni so dṛṣṭo / te dāni ojjhāyanti / etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1174_7: pe / yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati jatumaṭṭhakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1174_8: jatumaṭṭhakapratisaṃyuktaṃ / jatumaṭṭhakaṃ nāma jatusya vā lohasya vā trapusya vā nāgrasya vā hārakūṭasya vā dantasya vā coḍakasya vā mṛttikāya vā aṅgajātakākāraṃ kṛtvā sve aṅgajāte praveśeti tena ca kāma rāgaṃ vinodeti thul'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1177_1: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi /
V05bhivin_u:1177_3: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā āha / mātṛgrāmasya bhagavan aṅgajātaṃ durgandhaṃ upavāyati /
V05bhivin_u:1177_4: labhyaṃ / bhagavan dhovituṃ / bhagavān āha / labhyā / tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo bāhirabāhireṇa dhovanti tathaiva durgandhaṃ vāyati /
V05bhivin_u:1177_5: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:1177_8: bhikṣuṇīya dhovantīya ekam aṅguliveṭhakaṃ praveśayitvā dhovitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1177_10: atidūraṃ praveśeti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1180_1: tāsān dāni bhikṣuṇīnām anumāsaṃ anumāsaṃ ṛtur āgacchati /
V05bhivin_u:1180_3: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato āroceti /
V05bhivin_u:1180_6: yasyā eṣa ṛtur āgacchati śoṇitaṃ sravati tayā ānīcolakaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1180_7: leṇṭakakhaṇḍāni / nāpi kṣamati gāḍhaṃ nāpi kṣamati atidūraṃ praveśayituṃ yathā tenaiva kāmarāgam vinodayet /
V05bhivin_u:1180_9: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī atidūram vā praveśeti gāḍham vā praveśeti yathā tenaiva kāmarāgam vindodeti sthūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1183_1: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo strītīrthe ānīcolaṃ dhovanti /
V05bhivin_u:1183_2: striyo dāni ojjhāyanti / sarvam idam tīrthaṃ rudhireṇa viṭṭālitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1183_3: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ / peyālaṃ / yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati stritīrthe ānīcolakaṃ dhovituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1183_4: strītīrthapratisaṃyuktaṃ / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ānīcolakaṃ strītīrthe dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1186_3: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo puruṣatīrthe ānīcolakaṃ dhovanti /
V05bhivin_u:1186_4: peyālaṃ / yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ānīcolakaṃ puruṣatīrthe dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1189_2: bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati rajakatīrthe dhovituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1189_3: atha khu kuṇḍālake vā kaṭāhake vā mallake vā dakānake vā udakaṃ gṛhya ekānte dhovitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1189_4: yahiṃ paryādānaṃ gaccheya / atha dāni bāhirodakaṃ bhavati yahiṃ nirvāho tahin dhovitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1189_5: tāni leṇṭakāni śoṣayitavyāni yadā puno ṛtu nāgacchati tadā puno dātavyāni /
V05bhivin_u:1189_6: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī rajakatīrthe ānīcolaṃ dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1192_1: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya raktacittāya aṅgajātaṃ udake dhāritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1192_2: tasyāśucir muktaṃ / tāye dāni kaukṛtyaṃ / kaukṛtyena bhikṣuṇīnām ārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:1192_3: yāvad bhagavān āha / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī udakadhārāyām vā kuṇḍikadhārāyām vā udakacoḍena vā ālukaveṇṭikāyām vā praṇālyām vā aṅgajātaṃ dhāreti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1192_4: atha dāni snāyati taḍāge vā prasravaṇe vā praṇāliyam vā na dāni agrato udakadhārāṃ kṛtvā snāyitavyaṃ yathā pṛṣṭhīya vā śīrṣeṇa vā udakadhārāṃ praticcheya tathā snāyitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1192_5: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agrato mukhāṃ udakadhārāṃ kṛtvā snāyati tāya ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1195_1: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya raktacittāya udakasrote aṅgajātaṃ dhāritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1195_2: tāye aśucir āgato yathā udakadhārāya yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:1195_3: tena hi na kṣamati udakasrote aṅgajātaṃ dhārayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1195_4: udakasrotapratisaṃyuktaṃ / yā dāni tāyo bhavanti girinadīyo śīghrasrotāyo tahiṃ aṅgajātaṃ dhāreti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accyam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1195_5: atha dāni snāyati na kṣamati agratomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyituṃ pṛṣṭhatomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1195_6: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agratomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1199_1: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nānāprakārehi mocayanti mūlakena palāṇḍūkebukāye sobhañjanakena latikāya /
V05bhivin_u:1199_3: bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati vikṛtīhi mocayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1199_4: vikṛtipratisaṃyuktaṃ / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī mūlakena vā palāṇḍūya vā kebukāya vā sobhañjanakena vā latikāya vā illādukāya vā trapusena vā allābūya vā kakṣārukena vā anyena vā puna kenacin mocayati tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1202_1: aparasya dāni bhikṣusya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kriyate /
V05bhivin_u:1202_3: bhikṣuṇīya karma kṛtaṃ / tāye dāni kaukṛtyaṃ / kin nu khalu labhyā etaṃ kartuṃ utāho na labhyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1202_6: yāvad bhagavān āha / agrapariṣā eṣā / na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1202_7: karmapratisaṃyuktaṃ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ (!) /
V05bhivin_u:1202_8: atha dāni na kocit parikuśalo karmakārako bhavati labhyaṃ bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣusya uddeśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1202_9: atha dāni karmakarentasya vismarati labhyā bhikṣuṇīya anupradātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1202_10: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣusya karma karoti vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1202_11: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bhikṣuṇīye karma karoti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1205_1: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī kauśeyacīvareṇa prāvṛtā jñātikulaṃ gacchati sthūlavṛṣito devo ovṛṣṭo kauśeyacīvaramovṛṣṭaṃ kāyeśliṣṭaṃ sphaṭikapratyuṣṭo viya kāyodṛśyati jano sannipātito bhadrāye aṅgayaṣṭiṃ paśyitukāmo /
V05bhivin_u:1205_2: sā dāni utkuṭukā upaviṣṭā antevāsinīhi parivṛtā /
V05bhivin_u:1205_3: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ / yāvad āma bhagavan / bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati kauśeyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1205_4: kauśeyapratisaṃyuktaṃ / kauśeyan nāma jātimaṃ karttimaṃ ca /
V05bhivin_u:1205_6: deśanāgāmīvinayātikramaḥ / karttimaṃ prāvarati samvaragāmīvinayātikramaḥ kiñcāpi bhikṣur ubhayaṃ prāvarati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1208_1: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī vihārasyākāśatalake ekasaṃkakṣikāya caṅkramati /
V05bhivin_u:1208_3: janena uccagghāyati paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā alābutumbakena viya nadīṃ taratīti /
V05bhivin_u:1208_5: peyālaṃ / yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi gaṇḍapraticchādanan nāma kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1208_7: saṃkakṣikāye upariṭo osārayitavyo yathā gaṇḍā praticchannā bhaveṃsuḥ sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī gaṇḍapraticchādanaṃ paṭaṃ na prāvarati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1208_8: na dāni kṣamati prākaṭe pradeśe ekasaṃkakṣikāya āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1208_9: na dāni kṣamati prākate pradeśe ekasaṃkakṣikāya caṅkramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1208_10: atha dāni vihārasya gupte pradeśe caṅkramati ekasaṃkakṣikāya anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1211_0: yā dāni kumāriyo vuhyanti navavadhukāyo vā ānīyanti tāyo alaṅkarenti gṛheṇa gṛhan nīyanti /
V05bhivin_u:1211_1: alaṅkarituṃ khajjabhojjaṃ labhanti tena vṛttiṃ kalpenti /
V05bhivin_u:1211_2: jano dāni ojjhāyati / neyaṃ pravrajyā alaṅkārikā etāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1211_4: peyālaṃ yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati alaṅkartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1211_5: strīalaṅkārapratisaṃyuktaṃ / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī śīrṣam vā prasādheti akṣiṇī vā añjeti cūrṇakena vā mukhaṃ ocūrṇeti tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1211_6: atha dāni akṣiṇīduḥkham ti śirovedanā vā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:1211_7: ardhāvabhedakā vā labhyā akṣiṇī añjayituṃ śīrṣam vā mārjayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1214_1: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo mahākula pravrajitāyo utpalāni vāpenti vikrīṇanti ca /
V05bhivin_u:1214_2: tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpayanti / jano dāni ojjhāyati / neyaṃ pravrajyā utpalavāpikā iyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1214_4: yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni vāpayituṃ utpalavāpakapratisamyuktaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1214_5: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī vāpeti vikrīṇāti ca tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1214_6: atha dāni caityārthāya vāpeti bhagavataḥ pūjākarmāya vāpeti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1217_1: evam eva sumanāvāpanāya kartavyaṃ yāvat idam ucyate sumanāvāpanāpratisaṃyuktaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1220_3: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo utpalāni granthayitvā vikrīṇanti /
V05bhivin_u:1220_4: jano dāni ojjhāyati / neyaṃ pravrajyā kārikā iyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1220_6: peyālaṃ / yāvad āma bhagavan / bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni granthayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1220_8: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī utpaladāmām vāmallikādāmām vā āraṅgaṇadāmām vā kṛtvā vikrīṇanti /
V05bhivin_u:1220_10: atha dāni mālyopahāro bhavati jātimahā vā bodhimahā vā dharmacakramahā vā ānandamahā vā rāhulamahā vā pañcavārṣikā vā /
V05bhivin_u:1220_11: mahāpañcavārṣikā / jano dāni āha / āryamiśrikāhi śobhāpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1220_12: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī mutpalamālām vā mallikāmālām vā āraṅgaṇamālām vā granthayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:1223_0: evam eva sumanāgranthikāya nānākaraṇaṃ granthiguṇaṃ vā mālāguṇam vā puṣpakañcukam vā kṛtvā vikrīṇāti /
V05bhivin_u:1226_1: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo yāvan mahākulapravrajitāyo saṃjñikāḥ sūtraṃ kartayitvā vikrīṇanti /
V05bhivin_u:1226_2: jano dāni ojjhāyati / neyaṃ pravrajyā picukārikā iyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1226_4: peyālaṃ / yāvad bhagavān āha / tena hi na kṣamati kartituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:1226_5: kartanāpratisaṃyuktaṃ / sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī kambalam vā karpāsam vā kṣaumam vā kauśeyam vā śāṇam vā bhaṅgam vā anyam vā kartayitvā vikrīṇāti tena jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:1226_6: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pariśrāmaṇaṃ vā kṣīnaṃ vā bhavati labhyaṃ sī
V05bhivin_u:1229_0: 283. manāsmi / brahmacaryāto cyāvitā / āha / kena / āha / so me devaro paripāteti / so me nayitukāmo / āha / upaviśa mātā yāhi / vayaṃ te rakṣiṣyāmaḥ sā dān āha gamiṣyāmi āryāye mūlaṃ āryā me rakṣiṣyati /

V05bhivin_u:1324_2: ekam idaṃ gautami samayaṃ tathāgato ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ viharati /
